174b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems la mi gang gnas pa rnams// bsam pa ci bzhin don rnams rnyed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rigs ni gnas par gang brtson pa// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas byas pa gzo/ 
174b2(mdo sde): rnam par 'bar ba'i lus dang rab ldan zhing // mtshan bzangs sum cu rtsa gnyis de la 'byung // phan yon gzhan yang mang po mtha' yas pa// ting 'dzin mchog la spyod pas thob par 'gyur/ 
174b3(mdo sde): rtag tu mi skul stobs kyang che bar 'gyur// de yi gzi brjid rgyal pos mi bzod de// mkhas pa su dag sangs rgyas chos spyod pa// byad gzhin bzang zhing shin tu mdzes par
174b4(mdo sde): 'gyur// bsod nams gzi brjid dpal gyis mngon 'phag/ das te// lhas kyang de'i gzi brjid bzod mi 'gyur// su da dag byang chub sems la brtan gnas pa// da ni rtag tu srog chags
174b5(mdo sde): kun gyi bshes// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab ston pa/ de la nam yang mun pa med par 'gyur// sgra dang tshig gi lam bral brjod du med// nam mkha' ci bzhin
174b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rang bzhin te// 'di lta bu yi tshul mchog rnams rigs na// de'i spobs pa dag kyang mi zad 'gyur// mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang // sngon gyi mtha' ma phra zhing rab tu shes
174b7(mdo sde): chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu phra shes pas// mkhas pa'i tshig ni rtag tu thogs pa med// rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyur cing // sgra dang nges tshig rnam pa mngal mkhas// las dang 'bras
174b8(mdo sde): du rnam smin nges pa ste// khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag de 'drar 'gyur// mkhas pa bdag nyid chen po stobs bcu'i sras// ma tshang med pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang zhing // shin tu phra ba'i
175a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin chos shes pas// de yi dran pa rtag par yongasu dag/ shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ yid du mi 'ong sgra ni thos mi 'gyur// rtag tu snum
175a2(mdo sde): cing yid 'ong sna yang thos// de'i tshig ni rtag tu yid 'ong 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// dran dang blo gros shes rab rtogs dang ldan// de bzhin sems kyang rnyog med
175a3(mdo sde): dang bar 'gyur// mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chad// yon tan 'di 'dra'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// yi ge dang ni tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas// tha dad pa yi sgra mang du ma shes// don
175a4(mdo sde): dang tshig 'bru la yang mkhas par 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// lha dang mi dang klu 'brug srin po dang // lha min lto 'phye mi 'am ci la'ang // rtag tu sdug cing yid du
175a5(mdo sde): 'ong bar 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// 'byung po yi dgas srin po'i tshogs rnams ni// sha la// za ba shin tu mi bzad pa// de dag nam yang de la 'jigs
175a6(mdo sde): mi skyed// mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas// shin tu dga' zhing ba spu zing zhes byed// sangs rgyas la yang dga' ba rgya cher skyed// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab don chen 'thob// bde
175a7(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa'i chos mdzod 'di bzung ba'i// bskal pa stong mang de yi bsod nams stobs// rab tu brjod kyang rdzogs par mi nus te// dpag tu med cing mtha' yas tshad med do// 
175a8(mdo sde): ting 'dzin ni ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba yis// 'das pa'i rgyal ba dpag med thams cad dang // sangs rgyas ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu na// sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de yis mchod// skyes
175b1(mdo sde): bu la la bsod nams 'dod pas 'dir// stobs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rje can dag la// dga' ba dngag tu med pa bskyed nas ni// bskal pa mtha' yas dpag med rim gro byas// skyes bu gnyis
175b2(mdo sde): babasod nams 'dod pa yis// don dam tshul 'di las ni tshogs bcad gcig/ phyi mo'i dus su gyur tshe 'dzin pa ni// de la snga ma'i bsod nams char mi phod// 'di ni sangs rgyas mchod pa rab
175b3(mdo sde): mchog te// phyi ma mi bzad dus su gyur pa'i tshe// 'di las tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad gcig thos nas// 'dzin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod// de dag rtag tu rnyed mchog legs par rnyed// 
175b4(mdo sde): de dag grong gi zas mchog legs pa zos// stobs bcu'i sra das kyi thu bo dam pa ste// de yis rgyal ba mang po yun ring mtsho/ dad// bya rgod phung po'i ri 'di rang yang mthong // de dag sa
175b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mkhyen la ngas lung bstan// mya ngan 'das nas ni bam sa pa yang // de tshe de la lung yang ston par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas tshe dpag med pa yang // nga yi bde ba can du kun 'do/ 
175b6(mdo sde): zhes// phan yon rnam pa du ma de la 'chad// mngon dga' der song sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs mthong // bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med pa yang // log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa yong mi 'byung // byang chub
175b7(mdo sde): spyad pa mchog 'di spyod pa ni// rtag tu yid rab bde bar myong bar 'gyur// de phyir bye brag 'di 'phags de 'dra ste// 'di ni rab tu bshad pa phan yon mchog/ so so'i tshig la nga yi rjes spobs la// phyi ma'i dus
175b8(mdo sde): la mdo sde 'di zung shig/ mdo sde 'dzin pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// / gzhon nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa
176a1(mdo sde): de'i yon tan dang phan yon de lta bur 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par sla'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / med/ 
176a2(mdo sde): pas mi skur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang gis de bzhin gshegs par rab tu dbye ba'i chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing // sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa rab tu shes// 
176a3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni mtha' yas te// bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam pa dang bral bas na/ de dag bsam pa 'am dpag par mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu
176a4(mdo sde): sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa ste/ gzhon nu de ltar sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo
176a5(mdo sde): nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub
176a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid don cig tu bstan pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems
176a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po yid kyis nges par brtags pa zhes bya ste/ 'byung ba la mkhas shing khams gsum las byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so// ji lta ba bzhin du lta zhing log par mi smra/ 
176a8(mdo sde): rnam pa gzhan du mi smra/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// khams gsum la yang ma chags shing khams gsum la yang dag par 'das te/ 'dod pa'i sa dang / gzugs kyi sa dang / gzugs med pa
176b1(mdo sde): sa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sa dang / ming gis dang / sgra'i sa las 'das shing yi ge dang chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa ye shes mi zad par bsgoms pas/ brjod du med pa'i chos rtogs pa/ yi ge shes
176b2(mdo sde): pa/ yi ge la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos
176b3(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa yin te/ gtan la bab pa'i blo dang ldan zhing / bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyis zil gyis mi non to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad/ 
176b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshe/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu sngon yongasu bya ba byas pa khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyis bya ba brgya stong la byil dpe'i gzungs dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / chos rnam par
176b5(mdo sde): mthong ba'i bzod pa so sor thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad la/ bskal pa grangs med pa ban+d+ha stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad na// bla na med pa yang dag par
176b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ thams cad kyang ming ni tha dad / tshe'i tshad ni gcig par sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
176b7(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes lung bstan to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blo dang ldan pa gang // bla na med pa'i byang chub rab tshol zhing // chos dang de bzhin don la mkhas pa de// chos
176b8(mdo sde): kyi ngo bo nyid la spyod pa yin// yang dag ma yin pa'i tshig mi smra// sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag ci 'dra ba// rgyal ba rnams kyi chos ni de yin te// dpa' bo the tsom bral bas shin tu rig/ chos kun
177a1(mdo sde): don gcig par ni rab shes te// mgo gcig tu ni stong pa nyid yin pas// de dag la ni tha dad gyur pa med// don gcig la ni shin tu bslabs pa yin// rtag pa med cing rnam rtog/ 
177a2(mdo sde): med pa dang // dmigs pa med pas blo gros ldan par shes// zad pa dang ni mi zad 'du shes kyang // ma lus par ni thams cad rab tu spangs// de ni chos sku ma'i seng ge la// stobs bcu ldan pa gzugs
177a3(mdo sde): mi lta zhing // de ni phyin ci logs kun rab spangs pas// mtshan rnams su'ang lta bar yong mi 'gyur// chos rnams 'di dag bsam mi khyab// bsam dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi// de lta bur ni rab
177a4(mdo sde): shes nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong // ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes rig/ de bzhin kun tu blo yangs pa tong // chos kun de'i rang bzhin te// rnam par dag pa nam
177a5(mdo sde): mkha' bzhin// yid la rnams kyang 'byung ba med// chos rnams thams cad shes pas na// khams gsum las ni rna ma par grol// de la smon lam 'debs pa med// yang dag
177a6(mdo sde): ji bzhin du ni mthong gyur cing // ma log tshig smra rnam pa gzhan mi smra// de'i tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyang // rgyal ba dag gi mthu yis 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i sa dang nyon mongs sa rnams dang // gzug
177a7(mdo sde): dang gzugs med las kyang shin tu 'da'// chos rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing // rab tu dga' bas 'gro la phan par spyod// mig gi sa las 'das shing sgra yang shes// ngo bo nyid kyis gseg
177a8(mdo sde): tumyur pa ste// ji srid tsam du yun ring brjod na yang // de la gnas par byed pa yod ma yin// 'du shes rab tu rgyu ba med// lta ba log pa kun nas zad// blo yang shin tu gtan la bab/ brtan
177b1(mdo sde): parnam par 'dra bar spyod// gal te 'dud bye khrag khrig rnams// de mi sems dkrugs phyir 'ongs kyang // bdud rnams thams cad zil mnan te// de yi dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur// bdud kyi rgya ma
177b2(mdo sde): rnams spangs te// tshul khrims yongs dag gdung ba med// bsam gtan dag ni bde la mos// 'jig rten stong bar rab tu shes// 'jig rten dung por smras pa yang // de dge stong par rab tu rig/ 
177b3(mdo sde): skye ba rnyed cing dgag med pas// chos rnams thams cad rnam par gzhin// de dag bdag nyid gtong byed kyi/ #// gar smon par yang skye bar 'gyur// rangs
177b4(mdo sde): rgyas zhing du rnam par 'gro// sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mang // mtho ris dag ni mi 'dod de// smon lam rnams da ni yong mi gtong // chos nyid dag ni spyod che// skad cig brtson
177b5(mdo sde): 'grus nyams mi byed// phyogs bcu yi ni sangs rgyas kyis// de ni/ shin tu bstod pa yin// de phyir gzhon nu ting 'dzin la/ chos 'di dag ni rab thos nas// shes kyi khe ni rnam spangs la// 
177b6(mdo sde): skye bo mngal chos rab ston// sangs rgyas yon tan mang ldan pa// rang 'byung 'gyur bar gang 'dod pa// dge ba 'di la rab bslabs nas// stobs bcu 'chang ba sangs rgyas 'gyur// ting 'dzin rjes
177b7(mdo sde): slob pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
177b8(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ ting 'dzin nges par bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o// gzhon nu de la ting 'dzin nges par bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang
178a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi ba bzhin ci dang / mnyam pa nyid mi mnyam pa med pa dang / mi rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par ma bsgrubs pa/ kun nas spong ba med pa/ myed med pa
178a2(mdo sde): 'gog pa med pa/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa yong su chad pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ rnam par rig pa yongs chad pa/ 'dod chags dang / 
178a3(mdo sde): ni snga dang / gti tsug yongs chad pa/ mtha' med pa/ mthar yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ yid 'a byed pa yongasu cha dang / phung po dang khams dang / skye ched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros
178a4(mdo sde): dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang / chog dang / snod yul dang / na tan gyi gnas gyur pa/  mongs pa med pa sa/ ni ba'i sa/ sdom pa thams cad ma
178a5(mdo sde): chad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslabs pa/ debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yulayon ta/ na thams cad yong su rdzogs pa 'di ni/ gnon nu ting 'dzin nges
178a6(mdo sde): par bstan pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'di la gnas pa ni/ ting 'dzin dang ma bral yin// 'khrul pa med pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing / 
178a7(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ting 'dzin mnyam pa med pa'i sa// shin tu mthong dka' phra zhing ni/ 
178a8(mdo sde): 'du shes thams can cos pato// datsu dzin par bya// rtog pa med kyinam rtogamed// gdung med cing brtan du da// sems pa darigs pa med pa ste/ dkyi ba na
178b1(mdo sde): ces bya// nam cig mnyam par bzhag gyur te// chos kun lani rlom sems med// rlom sems med pa ji bzhin pa// de ni ting 'dzin ces bsgrags// chos ni rdul tsam yong med de/ rdul
178b2(mdo sde): ces bya ba'ang yong ma yin// chos rnams dmigasu med pa ste/ de phyir ting 'dzin ces bya// sems kyi dmigs pa med pa yang // de ni rnam par rjog ces bya// chos de rnam par ma bcwas
178b3(mdo sde): pa// de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis// sgra yis don rnams rab bsten te// sgra de nyid kyang dngos po med// sgra ni drag cha lta buste// bar snang dag gi namakha' bzhin// chos 'di rnams ni migs
178b4(mdo sde): te/ 'di dag la ni gnas mi dmigs// mi gnas pa ni gan das kyi sgrar// ngo bo nyid kyis mi rnyed do// 'gro na dang 'chi 'phor brjod pa yid// de lta bu'i 'gro ba med// 'gro ba
178b5(mdo sde): med pa 'gro ba'i sgras// ting 'dzin du de phyir gsungs/ mnyam bzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod// mnyam bzhag 'di yang rlom sems gnyis pa ste// rlom sems
178b6(mdo sde): med par byang chub rig par spyod// dran pa rlom sems med pa byang chub mchog/ mnyam dang mi mnyam zhi ba sangs rgyas sa// zhi gnas lhag mthong mtshan med 'di yin te// zhi ba sangs
178b7(mdo sde): rgyas sa 'di bstan byas nas// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la de brtson yin// don gyi rnam pa rig pa 'jug pa la/ yi ge dag gis 'jug par mi nus te/ sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par
178b8(mdo sde): spangs nas ni// mnyam par bzhag 'gyur de la rlom sems med// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di// ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas shing brtson byed na// gal te zhing 'di bskal
179a1(mdo sde): pas tshig gyur kyang / ri mchog dbus su zhugs pas mes ma tshig bskal pa brgya phrag mang por rab bsregs kyang // na mkha' sngan chad nam yang mi tshig bzhin/ 
179a2(mdo sde): chos rnams na mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas// de ni me yi nang du yong mi 'tshig/ gal te sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la// 'bar ba 'di dag ma lus zhi shig ces// ting 'dzin
179a3(mdo sde): gnas nas smon lam 'di btab na// sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med// de ni rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang mtha' yas 'gyur// na mkha' la yang thogs pa med par 'gro/ rje su bstan gzhin
179a4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin gnas pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan da'adi dag myong // skye zhing 'chi 'phor de 'gyur yang // skye da ba med cing 'chi 'pho med// gang gis de ltar rnam rig pa// 
179a5(mdo sde): de la ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'// 'chi 'pho skye ba med par ni// 'dzi garten mgon pos rab tu bshad// de ltar 'jig rten mag na rig nas// de phyir ting 'dzin kyang rig/ 'jig rten gyis
179a6(mdo sde): ni ma gos shing // 'jig rten chos la mi chags te// lus ni thogs pa med par yang // sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed// zhing dag na ni 'jig rten 'dren// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag
179a7(mdo sde): tu mthong // sangs rgyas dag gis zhing bshad pa// chos rnams de dag der yang nyan// de la mi shes yong med de// chos kyi dbyings dang rab tu 'chad// chos kyi rnam pa rtag tu rig/ de ni chos
179a8(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyi tshul// bskal pa bye bar 'chad ston kyang // de yi spobs pa zad mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan mang po// mkhas pa dag kyang sprul par byed// byang chub sems dpas
179b1(mdo sde): sprul pa ni// pad ma 'dab ma stong pa la// dkyi yo dkrungs bcas 'dug pa dag/ zhing nas zhing du 'gro bar byed// ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgoms nas ni// gzugs dang mdo sde bzang po dang / mdo sde
179b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang bye ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston// sems can mang po bsam mi khyab// phyir mi ldog pa 'god par byed// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston kyang // spobs pa dag
179b3(mdo sde): ni zad mi 'gyur// rin chen rnam par brgyan pa yi// khang pa brtsegs zhug de 'gro ste// dri dang ldan pa'i me tog gis// 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor// dri dang ldan pa'i bye mas kyang / 
179b4(mdo sde): 'dren pa la na rab tu 'thor// de dag thams cad byang chub phyir// rgya che ba yi mchod pa byed// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi// yon tan dpag med de dag ni// nam zhig nyon mongs med
179b5(mdo sde): gyur pa// de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag 'thob// nyon mongs da/ ga ni mi skye zhing // dag pa dang ba 'od gsal ba// mi 'a// khrugs 'dus ma byas pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
179b6(mdo sde): yul lo// rab tu zhi zhing nye bar ni// nyon mongs med cing mya ngan dral// spros med rnam par ma spros pa// spros pa dag las shin tu 'das// yi ge'i spyod pa med pa ni// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de/ 
179b7(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis rig par dka' bas na// de phyir ting 'dzin ces bya// zad mi shes shing nye bar zhi// lhun gyis 'grub cing bstan med pa// rnyog med yang dag nyid kyi mtha'// sangs rgyas kun gyi
179b8(mdo sde): spyod yul lo// 'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang / spros med lhun gyis grub pa yi// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bslabs pa ste// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di
180a1(mdo sde): bslabs nas// yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin// tshu rol dang ni pha rol med// sngon mtha' rnam par ma brtags te// de phyir sangs rgyas de dag kun// yon tan
180a2(mdo sde): dag gi pha rol phyin// 'od dang 'gro ba med pa dang // spros med lhun gyis grub pa yi// chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen nas ni// de dag de las pha rol phyin// ting 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i
180a3(mdo sde): la ru ste bcu gsum pa'o// 'phags pa ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bam po lnga pa// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ thA
180a4(mdo sde): gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i da lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
180a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin mnyam
180a6(mdo sde): banyid/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa legs par bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring por bslab 'di la bslabs nas/ 
180a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa ni bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so// bcom ldan 'das
180a8(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la skabs phye nas// bcom ldan 'das la
180b1(mdo sde): mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do// 'dod dang khro bas rtag tu zil nor cing // sdug bsngal gces pa'i sems can gzigs nas ni// skye dgu pa
180b2(mdo sde): byed sangs rgyas gyur cig ces// byang chub phyir ni khyod kyis sems kyang bskyed// dpa' bos bskal pa bye ba mang spyad de// sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rtag tu gnas// bzod/ 
180b3(mdo sde): dang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson 'grus nges// sbyin pa dag kyang mtha' yas rgya cher byin// rkang lag dang ni srog kyang rab gtong zhing // khyod kyi yid la nam yang skyon med de// gser da / 
180b4(mdo sde): de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang // chags med gyur nas rgyal po'i srid kyang gtong // khyod kyi tshul khrims dri med rnam dag ste// bdag nyid gtong zhing tshul khrims yong mi
180b5(mdo sde): 'dral// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rab tu bsdams// bder gshegs sems dul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bzod la dgyes shing bzod pa'i lam la gnas// lus
180b6(mdo sde): ni dum bur byas kyang 'khrugs med de// byams pa bsgoms pas de las 'o ma zags// bder gshegs ngo mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshalo// stobs bcu dag gi stobs dang ldan gyur cing // 
180b7(mdo sde): chags med ye shes gnas pas chos kun rtogs// thugs rjes 'jig rten phan mdzad chos kyi rje// skyes dgu 'di yi don bzhed thugs brtse ba// stong par mkhyen cing 'di na sems can med// de
180b8(mdo sde): bzhin 'jig rten lam stor gzigs nas ni// de dag rang bzhin bdag med chos rtogs bgyis// rnam grol skyes kyang gang na'ang rnam grol med// so sor rtogs te bag med thams cad spangs// 
181a1(mdo sde): bdud sde mtha' yas stobs dang ldan pa bcom// ye shes mtha' yas byang chub rgya cher mkhyen// mchog tu rnam par ni ba'i chos kyang ston// zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i gnam krung / 
181a2(mdo sde): zhing / ri dang grong du bcas pa'i sa bzhig la// namakha'i khams ni rnam pa gzhan gyur kyang // khyod ni mi bden pa'i tshig mi gsung // skye dgu dmigs pa dag la dga' ba dang // sems can sdug
181a3(mdo sde): bsngal khyod kyis gzigs nas ni// stong pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba yi// dmigs pa med pa dag ni ston par mdzad// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// mi dmigs pa'i bslab pa la// dpa' bo chen
181a4(mdo sde): pos bslabs pas na// khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'// ji lta bu yi chos bslabs pa// de lta bu yi chos ston te// mu stegs gzhan dag ji snyed dang // byis pa dag gis 'di
181a5(mdo sde): min// bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas pa// mi mkhas de dag 'khrul par 'gyur// chos rnams bdag med rig pas na/ khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'// dpa' bo chen po yang dag
181a6(mdo sde): gsung // yang dag chos la rab tu gnas// / mgon po yang dag bden gnas te// yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung // khyod kyi smon lam btab pa bzhin// khyod kyi yang dag spyod pa byung // yang dag
181a7(mdo sde): de yi rgyu 'dra bas// yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung // yang dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs// yang dag mtha' la shin tu bslabs// yang dag bsam pa yang dag spyod// yang dag mkhyen la phyag
181a8(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// khyod kyi shes rab mnyam pa med// ye shes gsung ba 'od mdzad pa// ye shes khyad par rab brnyes shing // ye shes gsung la phyag 'tshalo// khyod kyis byams pa rab bsgoms te// 
181b1(mdo sde): sems can kun gyi ba shes panyes rjong //  ba bzhin du sa smras te// migaso sa tu gnas pa 'o// tsun pa la khor tshogs rgya yang // tshogs rnams dag kyang sdung pa mdzad/ shes ra bab mong/ 
181b2(mdo sde): bar gshegs// 'khor gyi nang gshegs sgra yang sgrog/ sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // seng ge'i stab su rnam par gshegs// khyod kyis mu stegs kun btul ba// seng ge yis ni wa rnams
181b3(mdo sde): bzhin dpa' bo ma dul du la mdzad pa// mdul bdag khyod kyis btul// de dag mdza' sdug brtan gyur te// dbyer mi phyed cing legs par gnas// lta ba sna tshogs gnas pa yi// sems
181b4(mdo sde): can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// sdug dang mi sdug med pa nga yi// bdag med chos ni khyod ston te// ma bslabs pa yi byi/ rangs pa dag/ log pa'i lam la spyod pa rnams// 'dren pa gang
181b5(mdo sde): nas gshegs pa yi// lam yang khyod kyis rab tu bstan// bdag du 'dzin la su gnas pa// de dag sdug bsngal nyid la gnas// gang la sdug bsngal med pa yi// bdag med de
181b6(mdo sde): dag mi shes so// 'khrul pa med pa'i chos tshig khyod ston te// khyod la 'khrul pa mi rnyed 'jig rten mgon// khyod ni ma log pa'i tshig gsung ste// sdug bsngal mang thar mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// lha
181b7(mdo sde): klu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong mang po mkha' la 'khod pa rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyi don ldan gsung thos nas// thams cad 'dren la rab tu dga' ba skyes// tshig ni rab tu snyan cing
181b8(mdo sde): bzang la 'thad// mnyen zhing 'jam la yid 'ong dus dang 'byor// gsung gi yan lag dpag tu med dang ldan// phan byed skye bo mang po thar byed pa// sil snyan brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang / 
182a1(mdo sde): lha yi dbyangs spa dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog/ shin tu snyan pa dus gcig 'byor gyur kyang // bde gshegs gsung gcig gis ni zil gyis non// khu byug bya mang 'jal ban
182a2(mdo sde): sgra 'byin dang // kun la shin tu yid 'thad dbyangs snyan dag/ bya tshogs mang po thams cad sgra 'byin pa// sangs rgyas gsung gi char yang des mi phod// lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan pa dag/ sil
182a3(mdo sde): snyan rol mo glu dbyangs 'jam pa dang / pi wang rdza rnga rnga chen dung gi sgra// de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod// khu byug ne co ri skegs sgra rnams dang // khrung khrung rma bya mi 'am ci yi sgra/ 
182a4(mdo sde): sgra dbyangs yid 'ong snyan pa ci yod pa// de dag sangs rgyas pa/ sung gi char mi phod// snyan cing mnyen la yid 'ong dga' ba dang // shin tu mnyen la rab bsngags zhi ba'i tshig/ dbyang
182a5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad dus gcig bsgrags pa bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mchog dgar 'gyur yin// lha mi mi dbang lha ma yin rnams dang // srid gsum sems
182a6(mdo sde): can mtha' dag ci yod pa// 'od byed rnams kyi 'od snang de dag ni// bde gshegs 'od zer gcig gis zil gyis non// bde gshegs sku ni me tog rgyas pa bzhin// mtshan
182a7(mdo sde): rnams kun gyis sna tshogs spras shing brgyan// bsod nas rgyas 'grub dag cing rnam par dang // rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun tu ldan/ dung gi sgra dang 'khar rnga s+thAnan sa de ba di
182a8(mdo sde): la'i sgra la rab tu 'jam zhing 'thad pa'i sgrad kun// sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod// sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig stong gi sgra// sgra skad gsal zhing mnyen pa lta yi 'dra// 
182b1(mdo sde): lha dang lha mo'i sgra dbyangs dgar 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi cher mi phod// khrung khrung rdza bya ngu rab khu byug dang // ngang ba kun la rnam mang bya yi tshogs// de dag smra snyan/ 
182b2(mdo sde): / dus gcig tshogs pas kyang // sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod// klu dang gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dang // lha dbang tshangs pa lnga yi bdag po'i sgra// srid gsum yid 'ong
182b3(mdo sde): 'thad pa ci yod pa// de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod// tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha yi dbang po dang // nyi ma dang ni nor bu rin chen 'od// kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa du ma dag/ 'od
182b4(mdo sde): kun rgyal po'i 'od kyis zil gyis non// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang shin tu rnam par dag/ ye shes dag pa ga/ sum na gos pa med// mi dbang yon tan dbyigs tshogs
182b5(mdo sde): yon tan rin chen mnga'// rang 'byung yon tan thams cad kyi sa ni mnyam med mnyam// de ltar stobs bcu bden pa gsung la bstod nas ni// gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dag
182b6(mdo sde): bas tshigs smras pa// sangs rgyas gzhal med dpag yas la ni mchod pa yis// shAkya thub bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur cig smra// bde bar gshegs pa de yi spyod pa mchog mkhyen nas// mi
182b7(mdo sde): dbang chags med ye shes mapar nga 'dzum pa mdzad// stobs bcu sras kyi thu bo byams pas de nus te// 'dren pas gang gi slad du 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad// sa 'di dag kyang rnam pa drug tu yongs
182b8(mdo sde): g.yos lha dang klu rnams mkha' la 'dug cing rab dga' ste// shin tu sems rang mgu bas sangs rgyas lta zhing mchis// bde gshegs zil gyis mnon de dag lung bstan gsol// skyes du
183a1(mdo sde): mchog gi ye shes gal zhugs pa ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag gis ma lags// rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa// ye shes rnam dag dpe/ 
183a2(mdo sde): med ye shes ma lus gsungs// shAkyar seng ge stobs bcu mnga' zhing rnam 'dren pa// rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes kyi 'ang pha rol phyin// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang tha ba gti mug sel/ 
183a3(mdo sde): rab tu 'od snang mdzad pa khyod la zhu ba lags// byang chub dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir// 'dren pas bskal pa gang ga yi ni bye snyed dang // de las lhag par yang ni spyad pa rab tu
183a4(mdo sde): spyad/ gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di mdzad bstan du gsol/ ye shes dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir/ ston pas phyag dang zhabs kyang yongasu gtong ba mdzad// sras
183a5(mdo sde): dang btsun mo gnyen gshes rtsa lag phangs pa btang // thub pa 'dzum pa bstan pa 'di yi rgyu gang lags// rta dang / ba lang dang ni shing rta rkang thang dang // bran dang nor bu dngul dang
183a6(mdo sde): mu tig khyod kyis btang // spyod pa mchog spyod tshe ni khyod kyis ma btang ba// rin po che dang nor rdzas dag ni gang yang med// srid pa gsum na ye shes dag ni mchog tu gyur// sems can thams cad
183a7(mdo sde): kyi ni spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// sems dang khams dang mos pa dag la'ang mkhas shing rig/ gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan pa mdzad// mi yi gtso bo la ni gang gis mchod// gang gi don du
183a8(mdo sde): rgya che yangs par 'gyur// spyod pa 'di yang su dag rab tu 'dzin// thub pa gang gi don du 'dzum 'di bstan// sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// pad ma bye ba 'dab ma bye bar ldan// gser gyi ba/ 
183b1(mdo sde): ma shin tu 'od gsal ba// mdzes shing yid du 'thad pas las byung // byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul rab che ba// rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sras po de la mchis// chos smra ba yang mang po 'dir/ 
183b2(mdo sde): mchis te// 'dren pa la ni de yi slad du zhu// rnga dang dung dang khar rnga sgra chen dang // sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brdungs pa yi// de dag sgra ni na mkha' 'di la gda'// bde bar gshegs pa'i dbyangs
183b3(mdo sde): ni bsam mi khyab// khrung khrung dang pa ka la bing ka dang // khu byug bya tshogs mang po 'dus pa yi// sgra dbyangs rab tu snyan pa phyung ba yang // de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod// gang
183b4(mdo sde): gis sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rnams// sngon gyi bskal pa mang pong bsnyen pa bgyis// gang gis mi'i ga tso bo rab mchod na// su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan
183b5(mdo sde): ri mo gus pa mchog kyang bskyed nas ni// sangs rgyas byang/ chub ji ltar thob 'gyur zhes// gang gis rkang gnyis gtso la sngon chad zhus// su yi sla du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan
183b6(mdo sde): bstobs bcu ldan pa ji snyed 'das pa dang // da ltar byung dang ma byon bde gshegs dang // mi yi gtso bo thams cad rab tu mkhyen// de phyir skye dgu'i don du zhu ba lags// srog chags kun
183b7(mdo sde): gyi spyod yul mtha' yas dang // mi rnams gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra dang // skye dgu'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen// de phyir mi yi gtso bo zhu ba lags// rgyu dang rigs pa 'dul la
183b8(mdo sde): mkhas pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar thob snyam pa// spyod pa mchog la su dag spyod pa rnams// de phyir bdag na rkang gnyis gcol bu// gang gis phra zhing shin tu pasti dka'i chos/ song pa nipa
184a1(mdo sde): mtshungs med bsam mi khyab// stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyod yul bsgoms pa rnams// de dag slad du 'dren pa bdag nu'o// srog chags 'gro ba bas ma yas kun gyi phyir// gang gi
184a2(mdo sde): byams sam snying rje rab bsgoms shing // gang la sems can 'du shes med pa dag/ de phyir rkang gnyis gcol bdag zhu'o// gang dag ye shes mtshungs med bsam mi khyab// de dag la ni gzung ba yong/ 
184a3(mdo sde): med de// sems dang spyod yul dag gi pha rol phyin// de phyir mgon po la ni bdag zhu'o// tshul khrims ye shes yon tan pha rol phyin// dus gsum la ni ye shes mtshungs med 'jug/ khyod la 'khrul
184a4(mdo sde): pa dag ni mi mngar na// su yi slad du 'dzum pa'o// bstan/ shA ri'i bu dang ma 'gags mo'u dgal bu// bde gshegs nya na thos gzhan gang su mchis pa// 'di la de dag ye shes mi 'jug
184a5(mdo sde): ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul bla na med// chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin// bslab pa'i spyod pa kun gyis/ mngon par 'phags// 'dren pa thugs rje dag kyang rab bskyed la// 
184a6(mdo sde): don dam mkhyen pa gsung sgra dbang bar gsol// sngon gang bskal pa bye ba mang por yang // skyabs dang dpung gnyen mchog tu gyur snyam s+ho// de 'dra'i sems kyis rkang gnyis gtso dris pa// 'dren pas
184a7(mdo sde): de'i 'bras bu deng gsungs shig/ gang zag chen pos lung bstan mnyam pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang ba po// rkang gnyis gtso bo la ni rab rtog cing // thams cad thal mo sbyar te
184a8(mdo sde): gus par 'khod// sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ldan mang po mchis// bde gshegs sras kyi gtso bo thugs las skyes// thams cad thal mo sbyar cing gus
184b1(mdo sde): par 'khod// shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir// mi 'khrugs zhing phyogs 'jig rten rnam grags pa// shar phyogs nas ni spos kyi glang po yang // byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mdun 'dang
184b2(mdo sde): / mchis/  shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog nas// mthu chen thob dang sman ras gzigs dbang yang // byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig lhan cig
184b3(mdo sde): mchis gang dag sngan chad bskal pa bye mang snyed// ye shes dam pa mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// rgya mtsho kun gyi bye ma mnyam pa yi// bde gshegs dpag tu med pa bsnyen bkur bgyis// 
184b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab bsngags pa// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan pha rol phyin// 'jig rten phyo/ dgas rnams kun tu rab grags pa// 'jam dbyangs legs
184b5(mdo sde): par thal mo sbyar te mchis// sangs rgyas zhing du khrag khri ga spyad bgyis kyang // 'di 'dra rnams ni mthong ba rnyed da//  ste// legs bslabs sangs rgyas sras po yon tan can// 
184b6(mdo sde): thams cad thal mo rab sbyar gus par 'khod// ston pa kun gyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa// mkhas pa 'dir mchis ci 'dra de lta bu// snod du gyur pa 'di na gzhan ma mchis// 'dren pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs su
184b7(mdo sde): brjod pa gsungs// rgyal ba rnam 'dren gleng bzhi ma mchis par// gang zag dam pa 'dzum pa mi ston na// gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan pa// rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung dbyangs 'byung du gsol// 
184b8(mdo sde): ngang pa khu byug rma bya sa ras// 'brug gi skad khyu mchog sgra 'byin bzhin// lha yi rol mo snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// sems can grol mdzad gsung gis lung ston cig/ byams po bskyed cing dga'
185a1(mdo sde): pa 'phel bar bgyid// ye shes ston cing ma rig sel ba ste// don la rtog cing shes rab 'phel bgyid cing // bskal pa khrag khrig bye bar rnam sbyong ba/ rtogs pas nges
185a2(mdo sde): bgyis dngos po rnam par bshig/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig don nges par ston// mu stegs kun gyi smra ba rnam par 'jom// stong pa srog med sems can med pa sgom// bsod nams stong phrag
185a3(mdo sde): brgya yis legs par brgyan// sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya yis 'dir spyad de// lha rnams stong phrag brgya yis rab tu bstod// tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag kyang bgyis// gnod sbyin srin
185a4(mdo sde): po grul bum dad bgyid de// klu dang lto 'phye 'dab bzangs grol bar bgyid// rtag tu ma chags shin tu ldan pa ste// las drage'i 'bras bus 'phags pa gsung phyung shig/ rgyal ba ji snyed
185a5(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa dang // gang dag ma byon pa dag bzhugs pa rna/ mas// thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen cing thogs mi mang / 2// 'dren pa yon tan kun gyis shin tu 'phags// 'byung po/ 
185a6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// sa 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos// lha'i tshogs rnams mkha' las me tog 'thor// lha yi spos ngad yid du 'ong ba ldang // 'dod chags zhe sdang
185a7(mdo sde): rab rib ma lus bstsal// tshul khrims yongs dag yid kyang yongasu dag/ mtshan med rab tu zhi ba'i stong la dgyes// seng ge'i sgra skad sgrogs shig thugs rje can// spobs dang ldan zhing shin tu
185a8(mdo sde): snyan pa yangs// rgyal ba'i shes rab rdzogs shing ye shes rdzog/ thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten med// gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs// rma bya khu byug ka la bing ka'i sgra/ 
185b1(mdo sde): shang shang ti'u yi sgra yang yid 'ong ba// dgar 'gyur skad kun dus gcig tshogs pas kyang // bde gshegs su zhi char ni des mi phod// rnga dang rdza rnga khar rnga de bzhin te// dung dang gling bu de bzhin
185b2(mdo sde): pi wang dang / sil snyan stong gi sgra rnams gcig du 'dus// de dag bde gshegs sgra yi char mi phod// lha'i sil snyan dam pa stong gi sgra// lha'i bu mo glu dbyangs snyan pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams dga' ba
185b3(mdo sde): skyed bgyid pa// de dag bde gshegs gsung gi char mi phod// 'jig rten phan pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las// mos pa tha dad bzhin du sgra 'byung ste// rgyal ba bdag la ston snyam so so sems// 
185b4(mdo sde): gang gi slad du khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad ston// lha'i sgra dang de ba bzhin klu'i skad// mi 'am ci yi sgra snyan ci mchis pa// de dag nam yang nyon mongs ni mi bgyid// sangs rgyas gsung ni
185b5(mdo sde): rtag tu nyon mongs sel// dga' ba skyed cing 'dod chags dag 'am lags// byams pa skyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags// shes rab skyed cing gti mug blo ma lags// sangs rgyas gsung gis
185b6(mdo sde): dri ma thams cad sel// 'khor las slad rol tu ni sgra mi 'byung // thams cad kyi yang nem nur brgya mang gcod// mtho ba ma lags dma' ba ma lags pa// thub pa'i gsung ni snyoms shing bde ba ston // / ri
185b7(mdo sde): dang nags bcas sa 'di gas gyur cing // rgya mtsho'i chu dag de bzhin pas gyur la// zla ba nyi ma sa la lhung gyur kyang // rgyal bas bshad pa rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur// tshig gi yan lag thams cad dag
185b8(mdo sde): pa'i gsung // seng ge'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dbyangs// tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bde gshegs thugs rje can// gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bstan du gsol// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar
186a1(mdo sde): gyi 'jig rten sems can ji snyed kun gyi yang // sems dang spyod pa kun la rab tu mkhas// gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsog/ rgyal ba ji snyed su dag thugs rje can
186a2(mdo sde): dbang dang ye shes kun gyi pha rol phyin// dri med zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni// rtag tu rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// bskal pa bye bar brjod kyang mtshungs med pa// gang ga'i bye snyed yon tan brjod
186a3(mdo sde): bgyis kyang // yon tan dag gi tshad brjod mi nus pa// gang gi slad du mdzum bstan bshad du gsol// 'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe bcom
186a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'a/ thun pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar bka' stsal pa// / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis// mtshungs pa med
186a5(mdo sde): pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod// sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag 'phags brjod pas// rtag tu 'khor morashin tu bsngags par 'gyur// sngon yang rgyal po'i khab
186a6(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer 'dir// sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong // rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du 'dis// ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di yang rab tu dris// byang chub spyod pa mchog
186a7(mdo sde): 'di spyod pa na// 'di ni kun tu yi bur gyur te// thams cad du yang spobs dang ldan par gyur// kun tu rtag par tshangs par spyod pa spyad// de ni phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po la// 'di
186a8(mdo sde): lam pam khyod nyid nga'i dbang // rtag tu tshangs spyod gtsang la gnas nas ni// ting 'dzin 'di shin tu rgyas byed 'gyur// ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni rab tshol zhing // lam 'dir zhugs
186b1(mdo sde): pas byang chub des thob 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba mang pos yongs gzung ste// 'dren pa rnam pa sod pa tshod byed 'gyur// nga ni ye shes la yang rab gnas te// zla 'od spyod pa khyad zhugs
186b2(mdo sde): lung bstan cing // 'di'i srog dang tshangs par spyod pa dag/ phyi ma'i dus la bar chad med par bya// lag 'thil skyu ru 'bru lnga bkod pa bzhin// ma 'ongs pa na gang la mchod
186b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas bye ba dag ni phrag stong dang // de las lhag par gang ga'i bye snyed shes// lha dang klu rnams bye ba brgyad cu dang // gnod sbyin bye ba stong drag bdun cu dag/ phyi
186b4(mdo sde): ma'i dus la brtson pa byed par 'gyur// rkang gnyis/ gtso bo la yang mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis ga tse la mchod pa mchog byas te// ye shes bla med 'di ni rab
186b5(mdo sde): bsgrubs nas// phyi dus lus la de ni 'jig rten mgon/ rgyal ba dri med 'od ces bya bar 'gyur/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bdag nyid kyi// lung bstan 'di thos/ 
186b6(mdo sde): dga' bas rgyas gyur te// ta la bdun srid du ni mngon 'phags nas// mkha' la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa brjod// e ma rgyal ba chos mchog ston mdzad pa// rnam grol ye shes
186b7(mdo sde): bdag po stobs la gnas// shin tu nges pa'i ye shes mchog gnas pa// pha rol rgol ba dag gis zil mi non// chags pa spangs shing rnam par grol la reg/ dngos po rnam bshig
186b8(mdo sde): srid par chags mi mdzad// khyod la spros pa mtha' dag kun mi mnga'// srid pa gsum la chags med ye shes 'jug/ spros pa thams cad kyis kyang mi gos shing // lta ba spros pa
187a1(mdo sde): mtha' dag rab tu spangs// lam yang shin tu bsgoms shing gnas med ga/ zil gyis mnon su dang mi 'phrod med// khyod ni khams gsum dag la gnas
187a2(mdo sde): med de/ chu bo dang ni mdud pa thams cad spangs// sred pa'i 'khri shing 'ching ba mtha' dag bcad// srid pa spangs shing srid par mtshams sbyor me// chos kyi rang bzhin dngos mad rab mkhyen gyi
187a3(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i tshig kyang thug su chud// mu stegs phyin ci log la gnas pa dag/ mi mkhas de kun seng ges wa bzhin pashig/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi gter
187a4(mdo sde): gter mchog dam pa bdag gis deng 'thob ste// ngan 'a dgro log par ltung ba thams cad spangs// 'dren par mi 'gyur snyam du the tsom med// gser gyi kha dog mdzes shing
187a5(mdo sde): 'od gsal ba/ phyag brkyang de'i mgo la rab bzhag nas / lhar bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dbang bkod de// mi yi khyu mchog byang chub dbang bskur mdzad// 'dzum pa lung
187a6(mdo sde): bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa
187a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen pos// sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par bya bar 'dod pa dang / tingange 'dzin gyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa 'di la sems
187a8(mdo sde): can rnams rab tu dgod par 'dod pas// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya// gzung bar bya// kun chub par bya / bcang bar
187b1(mdo sde): bya gang drug ra gdon pa nga// chung na par bya// gan bya/ 'on ngos pad pa'i badzum pas bams pa / yang dubya/ gnan la yang cher yang dag par rab tu brtan par bya'o/ 
187b2(mdo sde): na/ ga'od rgyas thams cad kying bzhin pam patshad rnam par snyas pa'i tshong dzin gyi rgyal ba 'di na sang thams cad pas 'ad par byed pa/ nang thams cad
187b3(mdo sde): byed pa yin te/ gnon dun byang chub sems dpa' sengs dpa'i chen pas chos thams cad kyirang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par myos pa so 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'ad thos shing bzung ste/ 
187b4(mdo sde): bsgongs par gyu pa gnon du byang chub rang sems dpa' sems dpang can pa desems can mas cad ni dad pa'i drug bsnga ma thams cad byur bar byas pa cing 'dzin gyi dgas
187b5(mdo sde): pa'i bad bdun medapa' dgas pa la sems can nams / 'gad de/  'dzin 'di yang myur du 'tho / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngan
187b6(mdo sde): pa rdzogs pa tshang rgya'o// de nas de'i che bcom ldan 'das kyis bu'odagazhon nu gyur pa la don 'di cing bstan par byatshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyim sngon zung ba'i gtam bstan
187b7(mdo sde): 'di yang dag par rab tu bgad do// sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa dran pa ni/ bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan bstan pa la// dge slong mkhas pa chos su byung ba yang // de yi ming ni tshangs pa
187b8(mdo sde): byin nas bya/ ngan tho gros nas bya rgyal ba dri/ gnab gyu mi dzad drug bsngar tshe// de mtshangs pas byin pa chos sba ba// ba'i slob depo du na gyur pa yin// nga'i snga pa
188a1(mdo sde): lnga brgya mi nyung ba// brtson pa'i yid kyis na dang pyad gso ba byed/ nga yi nang ni gso bar ma nus nas// nga yi gnyen pa shes kun kyang sdug bsngal gyur// nga yang na bar
188a2(mdo sde): dge slong des thos nas// nad 'dri bar ni nga yi drung du 'ongs// tshangs byin nga la brtse ba rab bskyed nas// ting 'dzin mchog 'di de tshe bshad par gyur// nga ni ting 'dzin dam pa 'di thos
188a3(mdo sde): nas// 'phags pa'i dga' ba zang zing med pa skyes// chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab shes pas// nga yang de'i dus na nad las sos// mar me mdzad ni spyad pa spyod pa na// dge sbyong chos sna
188a4(mdo sde): mkhas par gyur pa yin// nga ni blo gros rgyal po'i buragyur te/ ting 'dzin ye shes kyis ni nad las thar// / de bas gzhon nu khyod kyis phyi dus na// yongasu nyams
188a5(mdo sde): pa 'di dag rjes dran zhing // byis pas nyes par brjod pa'i tshig bzod kyis// ting 'dzin 'di yang zung la le gas par lhogs// phyi ma'i dus la dge slong mang po dag/ 
188a6(mdo sde): brkam zhing gtum la ma bsdams 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig la dga' zhing lhung bzed chos gos chags// ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// rgod cing dbang po g.yangs pa phrag dog can// 
188a7(mdo sde): grong la chags shing rnyed pa 'dod pa dag/ sbyor ba byed pa'i skabs la rtag tu gnas// ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// lag pa dang ni rkang pa rnam par rdob// rtse 'jo dgod la rtag par
188a8(mdo sde): rab tu zhugs// gcig la gcig ni mgul khyud lag kyang sbrel// grong du spyod lam gzhan du sbyar bar byed// mi rigs sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ste// gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags// gzug
188b1(mdo sde): kyis rgyags shing mdud bor ba yin// grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun tu rgyu// de dag bza' dang btung la rab tu zhugs// glu dang gro gar de bzhin rol mo dang // nyo 'tshong lhag par byed cing
188b2(mdo sde): rtag tu brtson// btung ba dag la chags shing ngo tsha bor// mi rigs brtson pa spring yig skur bar byed// tshul khrims de bzhin spyod lam btang nas ni// khyim pa dag dang bsten cing khrims dral
188b3(mdo sde): nas/ de dag tshul zhig log par shin tu gnas// las gang sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag smad pa// srang dang tshad la g.yo sgyu byed par zhugs// de 'dra'i sdig pa nyon mongs las byas pas/ 
188b4(mdo sde): las ngan byed pa de dag ngan song 'gro/ dung dang gser dang nor bu nga nor mang dang // khyim dang gnyen bshes rnam spangs rab byung ste// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas// sdig
188b5(mdo sde): pa'i las rnams shin tu spyod par byed// nor dang 'bru la sI/ nga por 'du shes shing // bzhon dang ba lang shing rta rnam/ sa la chags// gang la bslabs pa'i nan tan med pa rnams
188b6(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang ci phyir mgo bo brags// ngas ni sngon tshe spyod pa sprad pa na// bskal pa stong du shin tu dka' spyad de// nga yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di btsal na// de dag de tshe 'di thos gad mos 'debs
188b7(mdo sde): de dag yun ring brdzun smra tshangs mi spyod// rtag tu rnyed la dga' zhing ngan song gzhol// tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// tshul khrims 'chal pa de ni chos mi smra// de dag
188b8(mdo sde): phan tshun dbye ba'i phyir 'jug ste// rigs pa ma yin pas ni rnyed pa tshol// gcig la gcig ni mi snyan rab brjod de// shi 'phos nas ni ngan song sar yang 'gro// de dag brgya dang stong gi
189a1(mdo sde): na na yang // de tshe brjod pa'i stobs ldan shin kya sto/ de byer 'thab la brtson pamang po 'thung / bzod pa spangs nas rab tu smras pa byed// byang chub
189a2(mdo sde): dpa' nges yin tshig tu smra// de yi sgra yang phyogs dang phyogasu 'gro/ mi bden sgra yi dregs pas de rgyags te// tshul khrims nyams la byang chub ga la yod// gang la bsam pa rnam par dag
189a3(mdo sde): med cing // chos 'di la yang bzod pa med pa dang // chos rnams spong byed byang chub 'di thob pa// ngas ni ma thos nam yang yong ma mthong // de dag 'jigs shing skrag nas khyim spangs te/ 
189a4(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas shin tu dam du 'dzin// skyes bu dam pa'i the dag pa spang byas nas// bye brag lhag par 'dod pa ba/ rlag par 'gyur// shes rab dman zhing yon tan rnam spangs pa/ 
189a5(mdo sde): theg pa mchog gi nyes pa rtag tu rjod// gang gi skyabasu de dag rab zhugs pa// de nyid la'ang nyes pa brgya dag brjod// 'tsho ba med pa mang po rab byung ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rnam
189a6(mdo sde): pa kun mi 'dod// byis pa de dag bdag tu lta la gnas// stong pa nyid ni thos nas skrag par 'gyur// phan tshun du'ang rtsod pa byas nas ni// gnod sems khong khro tha ba rab tu skyed// phan tshun du rang
189a7(mdo sde): bskur ba mngon 'debs shing // sdig pa byas nas shin tu dga' ba rnyed// gang dag tshul khrims gnas shing yon tan ldan// byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod rtogs pa// gnyen zhing des la
189a8(mdo sde): shin tu bsdams pa rnams// de dag de tshe yongasu brnyes par 'gyur// gang yang shin tu gtum sems ldan 'byung dang / mi bzad ma rungs ngan pa'i las byed pa// chos ma yin pa spyod cing 'thab
189b1(mdo sde): la dga'// de dag de yi dus na mchod par 'gyur// bsgom par bya zhing rab tu go bar bya// gzhon nu ngal dad pa'i phyir 'brang na// bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di dran nas/ 
189b2(mdo sde): de dag la ni nam yang yid mi ston// de dag 'dod chags che zhing zhe sdang che// gti mug che zhing nga rgyal dregs pas rgyags// lus kyang ma dul dag kyang ma dul zhing // sems kyang ma dul ngan
189b3(mdo sde): song gzhol ba yin// nga ni yon tan dag gi bsngags brjod na// dge slong yon tan dag la mi spyod de// tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi 'gyur// nan tan lhur byed byang chub rnyed mi dka'
189b4(mdo sde): sngon byung ba'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// de nas gtam 'di mthar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe byang rab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de ltar 'dug
189b5(mdo sde): bzhin du// bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshig su bcad pa/ sa zhus pa// ri'i rgyal po bya rgod phung po ste// rtag tu/ ngas rgyas gnas par bde gshegs bcud// 'jig rten
189b6(mdo sde): sgron ma der yang gshegs nas ni// khyod la bsam gyis mi khyab mchod par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis
189b7(mdo sde): mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba// ri yi rgyal po rgyal bar mngon gnas pa// ma pham bdud rnams pham
189b8(mdo sde): byas khyod song shig/ der ni 'gro ba kun gyi don chen yang / bla na med pa myur du grub par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis
190a1(mdo sde): tshig su bcad pas btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'khor de nas
190a2(mdo sde): byung ste/ sangs rgyas mu med pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma snyed kyi gnas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod rten chen po gang na yod pa der song ste/ phyin nas 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das
190a3(mdo sde): kyis yongasu longs spyad pa'i phyir de'i modado la/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mnyam zhing yangs pa rgya che ba// sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dag med cing kho ra khor
190a4(mdo sde): yug kun rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/ sa gzhingan po che and rnyil 'bar ba bsam gyis mi khyab la dpe med pra'i lha'i rgyan thams cad dang / rin po ches brgyan pa/ rin po che
190a5(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa du ma'i bkod pas rab tu smras pa/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas khyim gyi nyen 'khor brgya na cing spud de/ bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs nas ni bdug pa
190a6(mdo sde): 'thul bar byas/ phreng ba dang / lda ldis ni brgyan/ me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ lha'i rol ma'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lbab lhub bsgreng bas ni gang
190a7(mdo sde): khyams kyi dkyil 'khor du ni bla re bres/ 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus su rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul te/ rgyu spun las ma byas pa'i gos ni gting // 
190a8(mdo sde): tsa lin da ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i na bzas ni g.yogs/ steng du snying po bag tshar ni bting / snam rten mtha' gnyis dmar po ni bshams/ chu zheng dang
190b1(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa btsugs te/ zhabs rten ni lha dang mi las 'das pa/ 'dzam bu'i gser las byas pa/ mu tig gi drabs g.yogs pa/ ras rin po che bcos bus
190b2(mdo sde): g.yogs pa/ seng ge'i khri la btags pa'i lcir rin po che'i dril bu las ni sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba gsal ba 'byung / phyogs kun tu nor bu rin po che chen po snang bar gyur/ rin po che'i
190b3(mdo sde): gdugs chen po rtsa ba ni bai dUr+ya dri ma med pa'i rin po che chen po las byas par mngon par sprul to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phu khor yug/ 
190b4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa rgya na bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa mngon par sprul nas / skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs
190b5(mdo sde): par gyur to// zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyi na gsum bskor ba byas nas stan la 'dug/ de la 'di skad ces
190b6(mdo sde): bya ste/ ri yang lha rdzas yangs shing rgya che ba/ rin chen rdo stengs bzang zhing dga' ba dang // bsam gyis mi khyab lha rdzas yid kyi khyams/ dbusu rin chen seng ge'i khri yang btsugs
190b7(mdo sde): lha rdzas gdugs las yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing // phyogasu nor bu rin chen 'od cher 'byung // rtsa ba yid du 'thad pa'i bai DUR+Ya// ma pham rgyal ba'i sras pos de ltar sprul// ri yang rin chen/ 
190b8(mdo sde): sna tshogs rnam par bkra / rin chen gdan mchog rgyang grags tshad tsam du// byams pa dpa' bos de dag rab sprul nas// skad cig de nyid la ni khyim du zhugs// de nas bcom ldan
191a1(mdo sde): 'das 'khor chen po rgya mtsho lta bu la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan te/ yang dag par gzeng bstod// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/ yang dag par btsud de/ 
191a2(mdo sde): gdan las bzhengs nas gshegaso// de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgor byung nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gang na yod pa der gshegs te byon
191a3(mdo sde): pa dang / byams pas sprul pa'i khyams gang na yod pa der gshegs te/ byon nas byams pas mngon par sprul pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ni yongasu bskor cing byang chub
191a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ lha dang / daklu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / drang srong dang / na mkha' ldi rang dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pas
191a5(mdo sde): ni phyag byas te/ 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang na chos ston to// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thams cad ltar gyur pa rnams dang // 'jig rten gyi
191a6(mdo sde): khams gzhan nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig mang po dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo ni byed/ pheg ni rdob/ gdugs
191a7(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan ni bsgreng / phreng ba chen po dbul ba ni thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po zhi ba'i sgo nas byung ste/ bya rgod
191a8(mdo sde): kyi phung po'i ri ga na yod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ me
191b1(mdo sde): tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil sran dang / pheg rdob pas mchod pa chen po byas te/ 
191b2(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gus pa dang ldan/ ri mo dang ldan par chos dri ba'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / zla 'od bzhon nur gyur pa pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
191b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ 
191b4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig/ zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
191b5(mdo sde): kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skab sa phyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
191b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal te/ go skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
191b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol
191b8(mdo sde): pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnga ldan kyi rang bzhin ma
192a1(mdo sde): pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shing 'grogs na 'a
192a2(mdo sde): ba yin/ dul zhing dul ba'i sa thob pa yin/ de la pha rol gyi gshes ma/ spros pa'i tshig nyes par smra zhing / nyes par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing mi mjed pa'i rang bzhin can yin/ las la lta zhing nga rgyal
192a3(mdo sde): bcom pa dang chos 'dod pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos dang po 'di dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems
192a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ tshul khrims yod dasu dag cing tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang / tshul khrims la skyo dan med pa dang / tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims
192a5(mdo sde): sra srer ma gyur pa dang / tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrim sa mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang / tshul khrims mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims
192a6(mdo sde): dang / mkhas pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims yin te/ gzhon nu chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang
192a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum la sems skrag pa dang / sems spangs pa dang / sems skyo ba dang / don tu mi gnyer cing mngon par mi dga' ba dang / ma chags ma zhen pa dang / 
192a8(mdo sde): khams gsum la yid skyobs khams gsum las gzhan du sems can sdug bsngal rnams thar par bya'o zhes brtson zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sgrub pa yin/ 
192b1(mdo sde): te/ gzhon nu chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
192b2(mdo sde): chen po dad cing chos yongasu tshol bas mi ngoms pa yin/ mang du thos shing 'jigs pa med pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos lhur byed pa yin te/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lhur byed pa ma yin
192b3(mdo sde): shes kyi khe lhur byed pa yin/ phan pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis chos ji skad du thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa gzhan la rgya cher 'chad cing rab tu ston pa yin te/ shes kyi khe
192b4(mdo sde): 'dod pas ni ma yin gyi/ ci nas sems can 'di rnams chos nga 'di dag thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam ste/ gzhon nu chos
192b5(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen pos ting 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu chos gzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
192b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid ni par slob pa rgya yin nasra na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gzhon nu
192b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'dis/ ting 'dzin 'di ji ltar sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu ston/ 
192b8(mdo sde): pa yin te/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po'i drung dung rab tu byung nas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par smos pa'i ting 'dzin 'di rgya cher mnyan te bzung ngo // 
193a1(mdo sde): dris shing bca so// drag so// gton to// nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgoms pas bsgoms shing mang du byas so// gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bston to// de nas ba
193a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po nges par brjod pa'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
193a3(mdo sde): bstan pa/ dran pa bskal pa gzhal med dang g.yas na/ rgyal ba dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra byung ste// bde gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra de yi// tshe tshad lo yang brgya phrag drug cur gyur/ 
193a4(mdo sde): de yi pha rol sangs rgyas gzhan byung ba// mi mchog mtshan ni ye shes dbang phyug ste// rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu gnyis/ 
193a5(mdo sde): ye shes dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// gzi brjid dbang phyu/ ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo gzi brjidadabang phyug gi/ tshe tshad kho na stong phrag drug cu bdun// gzi brjid
193a6(mdo sde): dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// blo gros dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo blo gros dbang phyug gi/ tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang // blo gros dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ 
193a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i dbang phyug gi/ tshe'i tshad ni le wa zhi stong gyur// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// mi yi dbang phyug ces
193a8(mdo sde): bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo ma yi dbang phyug gi/ tshe'i tshad ni lo grang bdun khri drug stong gyur// mi'i dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal 'byung // rkang gnyis
193b1(mdo sde): gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal de yi// tshe'i tshad ni nyin zhag bdun du gyur// tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal 'byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshogs kyi dbang
193b2(mdo sde): phyug gi/ tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang // tshogs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad lo grangs bye
193b3(mdo sde): ba phrag dgur tshang // dbyangs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// dbyangs kyi zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi zhal gyi yang // tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag bcur tshang / 
193b4(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// zla ba'i zhal zhes bya/ dang rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo zla ba'i zhal gyis/ ni// tshe'i tshad kyang nyin zhag gcig tu gyur// zla ba'i zhal gyi
193b5(mdo sde): pha rol sangs rgyas ni// nyi ma'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / rkang gnyis gtso bo nyi ma'i zhal gyi yang // tshe tshad lon stong phrag bco brgyad do// nyi ma'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ 
193b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba'i rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal gyi yang // che tshad lo ni stong phrag nyi shu'o// tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i snyan pa zhes bya rgyal
193b7(mdo sde): ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i snyan pa yi// tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bco brgyad gyur// bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas 'di dag dang // 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa nyis brgya byung // zil
193b8(mdo sde): gyis ma non de bzhin gshegs pa yi// mtshan rnams 'dir brjod kyis mnyan par gyis// mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam par grags pa'i dbyangs// rnam par bsgrags pa'i gzi brjid rnam
194a1(mdo sde): grags swA// sgra skad rnam grags spang dbyangs mchod pa dang // dbyangs kyi yan lag dpa' dang dbyangs dag dang // ye shes stobs dang ye shes bye brag 'gro/ zil gyis mnon ye shes/ 
194a2(mdo sde): yang dag 'phags// ye shes 'od 'phro ye shes mngon par 'phags// ye shes rnam grangs de bzhin ye shes dpa'// tshangs pa'i stobs dang tshangs nor tshangs pa'i mchog/ tshangs pa'i lhar
194a3(mdo sde): bcas de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyangs// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug tshangs pa'i mi dbang spyan// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yan lag tshangs pas byin// gzi brjid stobs dang gzi ldan gzi brjid mchog/ gaH/ 
194a4(mdo sde): brjid dbang phyug gzi brjid mngon par 'phags// gzi brjid/ khyab dang gzi brjid shin tu nges// gzi brjid sgra dang dang shin tu rnam grags gzi// 'jigs brtsan stobs dang 'jig
194a5(mdo sde): btsun blo gros dang // shin tu 'jigs brtsan 'jigs zhal 'jig sa brtsan 'phags// 'jigs brtsan 'od 'phro 'jig mA~M cho ga 'jigs pa'i dbyas// 'jig rten rnam 'dren rgyal ba 'di
194a6(mdo sde): dag byung // sgra dbyangs zab mo dang ni dpal 'dzin dang // rnam dag sgra yi dbang phyug gtsang ma'i dbyangs// mtha' yas dbyangs dang shin tu rnam grol dbyangs// bdud kyi stobs dang bdud rnams skrag byed dang / 
194a7(mdo sde): spyan bzangs dang ni zhal gtsang spyan dag dang // rnam par dag pa'i spyan dang mthe' yas spyan// kun nas spyan dang rnam par grags pa'i spyan// spyan gyis zil gyis gnon dang ma smad spyan// dul
194a8(mdo sde): mchog dul dang shin tu dul ba'i sems// dul rab zhi ba'i dbang po zhi ba'i yid// zhi ba'i bla ma zhi dpal rab tu zhi// zhi ba'i pha rol phyin dang zhi bar dpa'// bla mar gnas pa zhi ba dul bar sems
194b1(mdo sde): shin tu dul dang ni dbang ni ba'i yid// ni ba'i bla ma zhi ba'i dpal 'bar ba// zhi ba rab ni dbang phyug zhi bar dpa'// tshogs dbang tshogs gtso tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang // tshogs rnams zil
194b2(mdo sde): gnon tshogs bzangs ye shes gtsang // tshogs kyi dbang chen tshogs dpa kho dang // gzhan yang tshogs bzang rab tu rnam par 'byed// chos kyi rgyal mtshan de bzhin chos kyi tog/ chos kyi bla ma chos
194b3(mdo sde): kyis rang bzhin 'phags// chos kyi stobs ldan chos dbang dpa' bo dang // rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa byung // rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges par ni// mtshan gcig pa yang bye phrag brgyad cu
194b4(mdo sde): ste// bskal pa gnyis la 'dren pa 'di dag byung // byang chub phyir ni 'di dag ngas mchod de// rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa da yi// rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams gang dag nyan byed cing // thos nas
194b5(mdo sde): rnam par grags pa'i mtshan 'dzin na// de dag myur du ting 'dzin 'di thob 'gyur// 'phags pa ting 'dzin gyi rgyalapo'i mdo// bam po drug pa// / de nas bcom
194b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i lo'u 'di zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la rgya cher rgyas par rab tu bstan to// sangs rgyas 'di dag gi yang pha rol na/ bskal pa bsam
194b7(mdo sde): yas dpag tu med pa'i tshe// lha mis mchod pa sangs rgyas gzhan zhig byung // de yi mtshan ni mi dbang dbyangs shes bya// de bzhin gshegs pa mi dbang dbyangs kyis ni// tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri
194b8(mdo sde): drug stong ste// nyan thos dag ni byed brgya phrag gsum// de'i 'dus pa dang por gyur pa yin/ mngon shes drug ldan gsum rig dbang po thul// mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po te// zag pa zad pa
195a1(mdo sde): tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa// 'od mdzad kyi ni dge 'dun de tshe byung // bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs byung // blo gros zab cing grags
195a2(mdo sde): pa shin tu che// mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur// mngon par shes pa thob cing spobs par ldan// stong pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud// zhing ni bye bar de las lhag pa yang / 
195a3(mdo sde): gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du 'phrul gyis 'gro/ rkang gnyis gtso la dri ba dris nas ni// phyir yang rgyal ba de yi drung du 'ong // mdo sde sgrub pa'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas// snang bar gyur pa sa yi steng na rgyu// sems
195a4(mdo sde): can don phyir spyad pa rnam spyod de// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po// mthu chen ni// 'dod pa'i rkyen gyis sdig pa mi byed de// de dag la ni lha yang smon pa skyed// srid pa'i 'gro bar mi gnas
195a5(mdo sde): don mi gnyer// mnyam bzhag bsam gtan gnas pa'i spyod yul can// rnam par nges pa'i don ldan 'jigs med pa// ma med par rtag tu tshangs par spyod// tshig kyang rgyun mi 'chad cing
195a6(mdo sde): spobs par ldan// nges tshig bstan pa'i tshig gi don la mkhas// sangs rgyas sras po kun tu yang dag ston// dge ba'i las rnams kyis kyang yongasu bzung // bskal pa mtha' yas par ni spyod pas 'phags// 
195a7(mdo sde): 'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bstod cing bsngags// rnam par thar dang don tshig yang dag stan// tshul khrims shin tu dag cing nyon mongs med// chu yi pad+ma bzhin du mi chags te// khams gsum las ni
195a8(mdo sde): rnam grol bag yod pa/ 'jig rten chos brgyad dag gis mi gos shing // lus kyang rnam dag las kyang yongasu dag/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes mthu yang che// chags pa med cing sangs rgyas yon pa/ 
195b1(mdo sde): gnas// sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung gnyen te// tshig tsam ma yin nan tan snying por byed// gang la gnas pa de nyid gzhan la ston// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongasu bzung // rgyal ba rnam
195b2(mdo sde): kyi mdzod 'dzin thugs brtan pa// khams gsum thams cad la yang skrag pa'i yid// rab tu sems zhi rtag tu dgon par spyad// 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyis byin brlabs pas// mdo sde bye ba phrag
195b3(mdo sde): stong 'chad par byed// 'chad pa de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags// 'jig rten dag gi tshig kun rnam spangs te// stong pa nyid la mos shing don dam ston// bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan
195b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho bzhin// mang du thos shing mkhas pa shes rab ldan// gzhon nu bskal pa bye ba mang por ni// rgyun chad med par bsta gras pa rab brjod kyang // de ni cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur/ 
195b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs gcig po bzhin// de tshe mi'i dbang po'i// dbyangs de ni// ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dga' 'di ston te// / stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di yang // lha dang klu/ 
195b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni gang bar gyur// de yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad tshe// so yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// lha dang mi rnams gang ga'i bye ma snyed// sangs rgyas ye shes la ni mi ldog gnas// 
195b7(mdo sde): der yang mi dbang rgyal po byung ba ni// dpal gyi stobs shes bya ba mthu che ba// de la bu yang brgya phrag lnga yod de// byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug/ rgyal po de yi btsun mo'i 'khor
195b8(mdo sde): kyang ni// bud med bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu yod// sa bdag rgyal po de yi bu mo yang // bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir chang ba byung // de yang ston zla tha chungs nya ba la// yan lag brgyad ldan gas
196a1(mdo sde): spyod bzung nas ni// bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu lhan cig tu// 'jig rten gtso bo'i drung du nye bar 'ongs// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal ba de mi/ 
196a2(mdo sde): spyan sngar rgyal po 'dug/ rgyal po de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas// ting 'dzin 'di ni rkang gnyis dbang pos bshad// ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal po des thos nas// rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin
196a3(mdo sde): du kun spangs te// gnyen dang rtsa lag sdug pa yongs btang nas// rgyal ba de yi drung du rab tu byung // bu yang brgya phrag lnga dag rab byung ste// de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor dang sras mo dang // gnyen
196a4(mdo sde): ba shes rtsa lag mang po gzhan dag kyang // bye ba khrag khrig pa dun cu rtsa drug byung // bu dang chung mar bcas pa rab dbyung nas// kha zas bsgrub pa'i sa yang bor nas ni// rgyun ma
196a5(mdo sde): chad par lo brgyad bar du bcags// 'chag cing 'grengabazhin 'chi ba'i dus kyang byas// rgyal po'i glang / ting 'dzin sems dpa' de// rtag par rab tu mnyam bzhag dus
196a6(mdo sde): byas pas// de'ang rgyal po'i pho brang der skyes te// mngal gyi dri mas ma gos rdzus te byung // de yi pha ni brtan pa'i stobs shes bya// blo gros che zhes bya ba mar gyur te// gzhon nu btsas ma thag tu tshig
196a7(mdo sde): smra ba// 'jig rten mgon po de nyid bzhugs sam ge/ 'jig rten mgon pos bdag gi sems mkhyen nas// de phyir bdag la zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bshad// rkyen rnams med cing rkyen dang bral ba
196a8(mdo sde): yang // srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams ni gcig tu bstan// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya gang // mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig byung ba gang // byang chub sems dpa'i nor ni bla med pa// ting 'a/ 
196b1(mdo sde): 'di ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// lus kyang gtsang shi ni gan / 'apra de ba pa pa pa dang / dmigs pa rnams las yang dag 'dar ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// chung
196b2(mdo sde): mi za ba'i 'bras bu chos bstan pa// lam mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bsgom pa ste// de bzhin gshegs dang phrad cing shes rab rno// bden la 'jug dang rtag tu chos shes pa// phung po yongs/ 
196b3(mdo sde): shes khams rnams mnyam pa nyid// skye mched rnam pa kun tu bskul pa ste// skye ba med pa mngon sum 'jug pa dag/ ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// so so yang dag rig pa
196b4(mdo sde): bzhi la 'jug/ yi ge thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes dang // dngos por 'jug pa las ni 'da' ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// dbyangs rnams
196b5(mdo sde): yongasu shes shing dga' ba thob// bde gshegs bsngags pa la 'ang dgar gyur cing // 'phags pa dag gi tshul 'jam drang po yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad
196b6(mdo sde): mdzad dam// nges pa nam yang khro gnyer mi byed cing // mnyen zhing 'jam la bzhin yang 'dzum pa ste// sems can mthong na sngon du smra ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// le lo med
196b7(mdo sde): cing bla ma'i ri mo byed// sri zhu che bas phyag 'tshal sdug par lta// skye ba dag gis chos shes bkar ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// 'tsho ba dag cing de bzhin dgon gnas dang / 
196b8(mdo sde): sbyangs pa dag la gnas shing dran mi nyams// phung po dang ni khams la mkhas pa yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// skye mched mkhas shing mngon shes ye shes dang // nyon
197a1(mdo sde): mongs bsul bdul ba'i sa rnams dang // gsang sngags mang po thams cad 'chad ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// srid pa'i 'gro ba kun las 'da' ba// 
197a2(mdo sde): dang / skye ba dran zhing chos la nem nur med// chos la sems shing thos pa tshol ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// khyad par 'gro zhing rtag tu sgom la 'jug/ ltung ba dag la mkhas shing
197a3(mdo sde): 'byung bar gnas// de la gnas pas bag la nyal ba sel// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// gang la ye shes rno ba'i mchog 'byung ba// mi g.yo ri bo bzhin du mi sgul ba// phyir mi ldog pa'i
197a4(mdo sde): mtshan dang gzungs kyi sgo// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdza dra dam// rtag tu dkar po'i chos rnams yongs tshol zhing / 8/ sdig pa'i chos rnams khor mor rnam par spong // rtag tu nyon
197a5(mdo sde): mongs phyogs rnams rgyu ba med// tir 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bsha da mdzad dam// bslab pa kun la rtogs par khong du chud// / mkhas pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rtog par rig seMn dag gi bsam pa
197a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pas skul// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu chos kyang ston// khyad par shes pa skye ba shes pa dang // mtha' yas shes pa shin tu rdzogs par shes// 'gro ba kun tu mtshams sbyor shes pa yis// ting
197a7(mdo sde): 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// khyim gyi gnas spang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems// khams gsum la'ang mi dga' mi 'dzin cing // sems rnams rab tu 'dzin cing dga' byed pa// chos rnams
197a8(mdo sde): rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad// skyob pa chos rnams la yang ma chags shing // rtag tu chos kyi mchog kyang yongasu 'dzin// las kyi rnam par smin la brtan mos pa// chos rnams rkang gnyis
197b1(mdo sde): gtso bo ston pa mdzad// 'dul ba la yang mkhas shing rnam smin shes// de bzhin 'thab cing rtsod pa nye bar zhi// 'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med pa'i sa// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston
197b2(mdo sde): pa mdzad// bzod pa yang dag 'dzin cing khro med gnas// chos la rnam par nges shing rtag tu mkhas// tshig rnams rab 'byed la ye shes mthong // thugs rje bskyed nas chos rnams ston pa mdzad// sngon gyi mtha' shes
197b3(mdo sde): phyi ma'i mtha' shes te// bde gshegs bstan la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid// 'khor gsum dag ni yongasu chad byar gsungs// rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston// sems kyang rab tu gnas shing rtse gcig dang / 
197b4(mdo sde): lus kyang rnam par gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa// spyod lam dag kya/ nga rtag tu bsrung ba yi// chos ni skyes bu khyu mchog thub pa ston// khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing mdzes pa dang // 'jig rten shes
197b5(mdo sde): pa rigs pa'i tshig rnams gsung // chos rnams 'byung ba srog chag sa rang bzhin dang // byang chub dam pa mchog gi chos kyang ste na// rje su phan gdags pa dang khrel yod dang // mi dge ba'i sems/ 
197b6(mdo sde): la smad pa dang // sbyangs pa rje su mi gtong bsod snyoms spyod// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad// khrel yod ngo tsha shes pa rtag tu spyod// bla ma la yang gus smra ldang ba dang // thog ma nyid nas nga
197b7(mdo sde): rgyal tshar gcad par// sa rnams rgyal ba chos rje de ltar ston// sems ni ldang ba nas kyang sems dge ste// ye shes khong du chud cing rtogs par byed// mi shes phyogs rnams rtag tu rnam par spong / 
197b8(mdo sde): byang chub mchog gi chos rnams ston pa mdzad// sems la 'jug pa dang ni sgra shes pa// nges pa'i tshig la 'jug cing don rtogs dang / gnod pa thams cad rta tu rnam spang bar// rgyal ba
198a1(mdo sde): chos kyi bdag po de ltar ston// skyes bu dam pa rtag tu yang dag bsten// skyes bu ngan pa dag ni rnam par spangs// rgyal ba la yang rtag tu dad cing dga'// chos mchog rgyal ba de
198a2(mdo sde): ltar ston par mdzad// brtags pa dang ni brda' dang tha snyad dang // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams ni rnam par spang // rnyed dang ma rnyed pa la zhum pa med// chos kyi dam pa rgyal bas de ltar bstan// bkur sti
198a3(mdo sde): rnyed kyang mtshar du mi gzung zhing // bkur sti ma byas na yang btang snyoms bzhag/ yang dag bsngags pas nam yang rlom sems med// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// gshe zhing smod pa thams// 
198a4(mdo sde): cad bzod par bya// khyim pa kun dang lhan cig mi bsten cing // rab tu byung ba dang yang 'grogs mi bya// rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston// spyod yul ma yin thams cad rnam spangs
198a5(mdo sde): nas// sangs rgyas spyod yul la ni rab tu gnas// spyod pa phun sum tshogs shing dul ba'i sems// chos kyi tshul 'a de bde bar gshegs pas bshad// byis pa'i chos rnams rtag tu rnam
198a6(mdo sde): par spangs// rigs sum pa yang thams cad spang bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan pa rtag par yongasu bsrung // chos kyi bdag po rgyal ba de skad ston// smra ba nyung shing rab tu 'brel la snyan// gzhan dag la yang tshig
198a7(mdo sde): 'jam dge bar smra// phas kyi rgol ba chos dang ldan pas 'dul// rgyal ba'i rjesu bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// dus su 'gro ste dus la ma bab min// so so'i skye bo kun la yid mi brtan// sdug bsngal reg/ 
198a8(mdo sde): kyang yi mug med par bya// rgyal ba'i rje su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// dbul po mthong na nor dang ldan par bya// tshul khrims 'chal ba mthong na brtse ba bskyed// phan pa'i dngos la rtag tu gdams par bya// rgyal
198b1(mdo sde): ba'i rje su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// chos kyi sems can rnams la phan gdags shing // 'jig rten zang zing rtag tu gtang bar bya// bsags par mi bya spang bar mi bya ste// rgyal ba'i rje su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// / 
198b2(mdo sde): tshul khrim bsngags shing tshul khrims 'chal pa smad// g.yo sgyu med cing tshul khrims ldan la sten// nor la mi gnas bdog pa thams cad gtong // rgyal ba'i rje su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// lhag pa'i
198b3(mdo sde): bsam pas bla ma gnyer ba dang // ji skad smras pa de bzhin thams cad bya// chos smra ba yang mi 'chad bsten par bya// rgyal ba'i rjesu bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// ri mor bcas shing rtag tu yid dga' bya// zhi
198b4(mdo sde): ba'i lta bas khor mor gnas par bya// sngon spyad rnams la rtag par shin tu nges// rgyal ba'i rjesu bstan pa 'di 'dra'o // dge ba'i spyod par rtag tu sngon du 'gro// 'du shes bzlog dang dngos
198b5(mdo sde): po'i mtshan nyid dang // mtshan ma spang ba la yang thabs mkhas pa// rgyal ba'i rje su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// mdo sde bsdu ba pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang // bden pa bstan pa'i tshig la gdon
198b6(mdo sde): mi ba/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mngon byed ga / rgyal ba'i rjesu bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// mgo gcig tun tshig rnams brjod par bya// ji lta bzhin du mthong zhing rtogs par mkhas// rtag tu tshig la the tshom pan
198b7(mdo sde): bya rgyal ba'i rjesu bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang rtag tu bsten// 'jigs pa med ceng tshul khrims stobs la gnas// ting 'dzin gnas kyis mnyam par 'jug par bya// rgyal ba'i rje su bstan/ 
198b8(mdo sde): pa 'di 'dra'o// shes kyi khe 'dod phyir na yongs mi bstan// sems kyang gya gyu can du mi bya ste// lta bar byas pa thams cad rnam par spang // rgyal ba'i rje su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// spobs pa mchog dang
199a1(mdo sde): gzungs kyang dam pa ste// yis snang ba pha rol mtha' ma med// gsang sngags byin rlabs rig par spobs pa ni// rgyal ba'i rjesu bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// lam 'di bsgom pa dag ni
199a2(mdo sde): tshul gyi sgo// bstan pa 'di la spyad nas nan tan dang // tshul dang gdams pa rje su bstan pa bzang // rgyal ba'i rjesu bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// rdza su 'thun pa'i bzod pa sangs rgyas bsngags// bzod la gnas
199a3(mdo sde): pas nyes pa rnam par spong // ye shes la yang gnas nas mi shes spang // rgyal ba'i rje su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// ye shes rten yin de bzhin rnal 'byor sa// byang chub zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug ste/ 
199a4(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa rtag par bsten pa ni// rgyal ba'i rjesu bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// mi rigs brtson par khor mor rnam par spangs// / sangs rgyas sa ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad// mkhas
199a5(mdo sde): pa kun gyis rje su yi rang ba// rgyal ba'i rje su bstan pa 'di 'dra// byis pa mi shes pas ni spangs pa ste/ 'di ni nyan thos/ mang po'i sa ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' dag gis
