273b7(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam bsam gyi mi byas khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ 
273b8(mdo sde): gzhon smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gang gi nyin par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
274a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i nyi ma ma 'das pas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul nas/ sems can tshad med pa 'dul
274a2(mdo sde): ba byas te/ zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod// sems can tshad med pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas// nyi ma de ma 'das par yongasu mya
274a3(mdo sde): ngan las 'daso// bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i dam pa'i chos lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par gyur to// gnon bcom ldan 'das smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab
274a4(mdo sde): pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgrab com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan dpa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na/ dge slong / 
274a5(mdo sde): dmigs pa'i lta ba can mang po byung ste/ de dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde la mi sred mi mos shing phyir zlog par byed/ spong bar byed de/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong dag la yang
274a6(mdo sde): gnod par byed cing srog kyang gcod par byed/ rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la chags pa de dag gis/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong stong srog bcad par gyur to// gzhon de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
274a7(mdo sde): rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs shes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba/ dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung ste/ gzhon yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
274a8(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dge slong yang dag blo gros zhes bya ba ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa/ chos smra ba/ rgyal po de'i pho brang du 'gro zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ phan par 'dod pa/ 
274b1(mdo sde): snying brtse ba don du 'dod pa zhi byung ste/ rgyal po de yang de la rgyun mi chad par lta bas mi ngoms te rtag tu 'dod par gyur to// de yang bstan pa dang / chos kyi gtam bya ba dang / nye bar 'gro ba dang / 
274b2(mdo sde): bsnyen bskur bya ba dang / yongasu dri ba dang / gzung ba dang / tshig gis go bar byed nus shing dge slong chos smra ba de/ sems can dag gi g.yo ba dang / spyod lam dang / mos pa dang / khams/ 
274b3(mdo sde): dang / bag chags la mkhas te/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pashes shing / khams dang / bag chags la yang mkhas/ bden pa dang
274b4(mdo sde): mtshams sbyar ba la yang mkhas/ mtshams dpral ba dang / tshig gi lan gtan la dbangs yang mkhas/ spobs pa dazab cing sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la yang
274b5(mdo sde): mkhas/ gsong por smra zhing bzhin la khro gnyer med/ sems te/ na por gyur pa la gnas pa/ snying rje chen po la brtson pa/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mnon pa
274b6(mdo sde): yin// gzhon de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs kyi bu mo skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa/ byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mtsho
274b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ye shes ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i slob dpon ni dge slong yang dag blo gros shes bya ba yin te/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga'
274b8(mdo sde): bar byed pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yino// gzhon de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i brla gnyis la/ 'brum bu me dpal nag po chen po gso dka' zhing sman dkon pa ni/ 
275a1(mdo sde): byung ste/ na ba de sman pa dag gis spangs par gyur to// de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ sras dang sras mo dang / zham ring bar bcas
275a2(mdo sde): pa/ dge slong den par rig nas rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma byu'o// bud med brgyad khrir bcas pa dang / grong dang grong khyer gyi mi rnamasu bcas pa dang gu 'apo nga / chos ya nga gung kyi'i dang kyi yang/ blon pod/ 
275a3(mdo sde): blon po chen po dang / spo ba dang / 'khor rnam su bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang dge slong de na par thos nas/ rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma 'byin te/ dge slong 'di 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur te re zhes
275a4(mdo sde): de skad 'dzer to// gzhon de'i tshe de'i dus na// rgyal po tshan dpo ye shes stobs la lha mo sngon gnag gi gnyen mtsham su myu napa mad/ de rgyal ba'i phye bzhin 'brang bas rmilam
275a5(mdo sde): du bstan pa/ rgyal pa chen po gal te dge slong de la mtshan/ dang khrag sar ba ma rul bas 'brum bu me dpal nag/ po 'di la byugs te/ mi'i shas rab ma rul ba las
275a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs su g.yos byas te byin na/ dge slong 'di nad 'di las 'tsho bar 'gyur zhes zero// de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs mtshan mo de 'das pa dang / gnyid kyis log pa las ra
275a7(mdo sde): debatsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs nas/ rmi lam gyi rnam pa de dag btsun ma'i 'khor rnams la bzlas te/ pa'i tshalam 'di la bu zhig mthong zhes bzlas nas go bar byas na// gnon
275a8(mdo sde): lta dud med kyi khyim de dang / rgyal po brang de nas dge slong de la ci de sbyin par su yang spro ba med do// rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan yang rmilam de lta bu zhig rmos nas sad pa dang \u0f7f
275b1(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ste/ rmi lam gyi rnam pa de dag/ ma dang zham ring ma rnams la gtam byas kyang / dge slong de la rtsi de sbyin par su yang spro ba medo// de nas rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan
275b2(mdo sde): de dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas 'di lta bur brtson par byas te/ 'di ltar bdag gis rtsi 'di dag bdag gi lus las gcad/ 
275b3(mdo sde): ji skad bstan pa bzhin du khrag sar pa dang / sha sar pa sbyin par bya'o// rgyal po'i pho brang na bdag ni thams cad kyi nang na gzhon zhing chung ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyang kun nas nyon
275b4(mdo sde): mongs pa ma yin la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ye shes btsal bar chos smra ba kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la/ bdag gis lus kyi sha dang khrag phul te/ dge slong 'di ni
275b5(mdo sde): ci nas nad 'di las sos par bya'o snyamo// de nas rgyal po 'i bu mo ye shes ldan de rang gi gnasu song nas/ mtshon rnon po thogs te/ chos la zhugs pa'i yid kyis/ bdag
275b6(mdo sde): gi brla las sha bcad nas ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa gya nom par g.yos byas nas khrag kyang thogs te/ 'phags pa de'i drung du song nas/ rgyal po ye shes stobs kyi mdun du 'dug te/ 
275b7(mdo sde): khrag gis 'brum bu me dpal nag po de la byugs nas/ g.yos legs par byas pa'i zas de dag dge slong de zar bcug te/ 'grangs par byed cing legs par bstabaso// de nas
275b8(mdo sde): dge slong de mi shes ma rig mi dogs pas// zas de zoso// zas de zos ma thag tu dge slong de'i nad thams cad med par gyur te/ nad de thams cad kyang so so// de yongasu gdung ba dang
276a1(mdo sde): bral zhing bde ba dang ldan pas/ de lta de lta bur chos bstan te/ btsun ma'i 'khor da dang / grong ba dang / yul mo dang / yul 'khor ba 'dus pa de dag las
276a2(mdo sde): srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// de nas rgyal po ye shes stobs kyis bdag gi bu mo la tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag smras// 
276a3(mdo sde): bu mo khyod kyis khrag 'di ga las rnyed// mi'i sha 'di dag kyang gang nas blangs// bu mo khyod kyis kha zas 'di byas pas// chos smra 'di yang 'di ltar bde bar gyur// sna tshog
276a4(mdo sde): blo dang ldan pa'i g.yos byas pa/ gsad pa yin nam/ de ste shi ba rnyed// bu mo khyod kyis khrag 'di ga las rnyed// des ni sdig pa'i nad las 'di thar byas// bu/ 
276a5(mdo sde): bu mo des ni pha yis tshig thos nas// bu mo ye shes ldan rgya sa 'di skad smras// zhum sems med par tshig kyang rab
276a6(mdo sde): smras te// bdag ni tsa mchis yab khyob gsan du gsol// lha yis bstan pa'i rmi lam dag/ bdag gis mthong bar gyur to yab// sa yi bdag po bdag la gson// yang dag don
276a7(mdo sde): ni mkhyen par mdzod// lha de bdag la 'di skad ston// mi'i sha dang khrag rnams ni// dge slong 'di la sus byin na// sdig pa'i nad las thar bar 'gyur// bdag ni mal nas/ 
276a8(mdo sde): langs nasu// btsun mo'i 'khor du mchis nas ni// bdag gi de tshe rmi lam rnams// ma yi gco la bzlas shing smras// sdig pa'i nad las thar par 'gyur// bran mo rnams
276b1(mdo sde): la bdag gis bsgo// 'di lta bu dag su byed nus// mi yi khrag dang sha rnams ni// khu bar btsos pa g.yos byas te// za su rab tu sbyin bya zhing // khrag dag gis kyang byugs na su/ 
276b2(mdo sde): me dpal nag po 'di las kyang // dge slong ji ltar thar par bya// cho ga myur du ma byas na// rtsi sman dag ni ma byas pas// dge slong 'di ni nad 'di yis// myur du 'chi ba'i dus byed
276b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ rang gi sha dang khrag stong pa// srid pa gsum na sems can gang // mkhas pa su zhig 'di mthong nas// lus la yang ni gnas par byed// btsun mo'i 'khor du
276b4(mdo sde): bdag gis go bar bgyis// bud med gcig kyang spyi na zhes mi mchi nas// bdag la dge slong de phangs kyang // byang chub phyir ni bdag gi sha khrag btang // byang
276b5(mdo sde): chub zhi pa mya ngan med tshol ba// de dag lus la mos shing rten pa min// bdag nyid la yang rdul tsam phangs pa med/ bdag nyid btang yang yid na mi dga' med
276b6(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor rnams de thos nas// thams cad rdugs pa bzhin du gyur// bya ba de dag sbyar ba ni// su yang spro bar ma gyur to// de nas bdag gi sems skyes pa// dge
276b7(mdo sde): slong 'di la zas byin te// bdag gi sha yang bcad nas ni// khrag rnams kyis kyang bsku bar bya// bdag gis brla las sha bcad de// sha rnams dang ni khrag blangs nas/ 
276b8(mdo sde): yi snag gu bdag gis bsgral// blo ba sna tshogs g.yos legs bgyis// dge slong na ba de la ni// mi sha yi ni kha zas dang // khrag rnams kyis kyang byug pa dag/ bdag gis
277a1(mdo sde): yab kyi spyan sngar stsal// mi yi bdag po bdag gi tshig la gson// sa bdag mi sha dag ni ma rnyed nas// bdag gi brla las sha dag bcad na su// de sbubs
277a2(mdo sde): chos smra 'di la stsol ba lags// bdag gi bla med byang chub don phyir du// rang gi lus kyis don chen 'di dag bgyis// dge slong 'di yang thar bgyis mi bde med// bdag gi
277a3(mdo sde): bsod nams dag ni tshad med bgyis// bu mo de la rgyal pos 'di skad smras// bu mo khyod kyi rtsor ni bya ba'i phyir// ji ltar lus las rang gi sha bcad na// khyod kyi lus la na tshar
277a4(mdo sde): ma gyur tam// rgyal po'i bu mo blo ldan 'jigs med pa das// de tshe smras pa rgyal po bdag la gson/ las kyi rnam smin bsam yas de 'dra ba// de dag gnas
277a5(mdo sde): nas tshul bzhin mkhyen par mdzod// yab cig sdig pa'i las rnams bgyis pa yis// sems can sem sa dmyal mi zad ltung 'gyur na// dge ba'i las dang
277a6(mdo sde): mos pa de dag las// sha dang khrag rnams skye ba smos ci 'tshal// sha gcad bdag la na tsha ma mchis te// khrag byung ba dag la g.yo ba yong ma mchis// bdag gi sha rnams
277a7(mdo sde): thams cad gcad na yang // chos kyi lus la rma dang skyon ma mchis// bdag gi chos la dga' ba mchog bskyed nas// rang gi brla las sha gcad rab tu stsa la// rma dang sdug/ 
277a8(mdo sde): bsngal bdag la ma mchis te// bdag gi lus kyang sngon gyi bzhin du gyur// 'di 'dra ba'i chos sgra 'di lta bu// brgyal ma na yang 'dzam bu grong du 'byung // yab cig
277b1(mdo sde): dum 'bar ba'i me tog bzhin// bskal pa bye ba mang la res 'ga' gda'// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i chu'o gser 'bar ga/ sems can lta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin
277b2(mdo sde): du ni chos smra de 'dra ba// lha dang mi dag mthong bas chog mi shes// skye bo skom pa dang ba'i chu 'thungs nas// skom pas gdungs pa skom pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin chos smra mkhas pa 'di dag kyang
277b3(mdo sde): chos kyis bdud rtsis srog chags sred pa sel// dge slong mi bzad na ba 'di la yang // sha dang khrag ni bdag gis rab tu btang // chos smra ba ni dam dpal rab zhi ste// bdag
277b4(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i rim gro bgyis// mang du/ thos shing spyod dang ldan pa ste/ ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni 'dzin pa la// 'di ltar bdag gis rang gi sha
277b5(mdo sde): btang bas// chos 'di rnams kyang bdag gis thob par shog/ ji ltar spos rab dri zhim yid 'ong ba// dus 'brang dang ni tsan dan dmar po yis// dri dag phyogs bcu
277b6(mdo sde): rnam su ldang ba ltar// chos smra de yi de bzhin no// ji ltar ri rab phyogasu rab snang shing // kun nas mdzes pa mthong na dga' bar 'gyur// phyogasu rab tu snang zhing gsal bar bgyid
277b7(mdo sde): de bzhin chos smra 'di yang ri rab 'dra// ji ltar mchod rten la la zhig pa ni// skyes bu mkhas pas bcos shing sgrar bslang ste// mchod rten de la dad par bgyid pa ni// de ltar bslang
277b8(mdo sde): pa de yang de yi rgyu// de bzhin chos kyi mchod rten na ba yang // chos la gus pas rang gi sha dang ni// khrag gis byug pa dag gis thar par bgyis// 'dzam bu'i gling du bdag gis
278a1(mdo sde): mar me bltam// dge slong 'di na 'chi ba'i dus bgyis na// 'dzam bu'i gling ngu ting 'dzin sgra yang ni// sems can rnams la rtag tu nub par dru/ 
278a2(mdo sde): 'di gsos pas ni ting 'dzin rnams kyang thog/ dge slong 'di ni 'jig rten kun gyi skyabs// 'jig rten mdod pa dgal mig sbyin pa/ 'dod chags dang ni ni snang gti mug 'ad
278a3(mdo sde): sman pa'i rgyal po chen po gso par bgyid// chen por gyur par rtag tusems gnas te// de yi spyod pa dag ni tshad ma rnyed// nges pa'i don dang tshigs shin tu bslabs/ 
278a4(mdo sde): pha rol rgol ba kun gyi zil ma non// chos smra ba la rin dgro mchog bgyis pas// bskal pa bye ba phrag na stong du yang // bdag la phyir yang log ltung 'jigs
278a5(mdo sde): ma mchis// bud med dngos po bdag ni phyis mi 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bas ni
278a6(mdo sde): shin tu dka' ba spyod pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di thos nas// chos smra ba na ba la sman shin tu dkon pas rim gro bya ba la rtson zhing // bdag gi sha
278a7(mdo sde): dang khrag gis kyang rim gror bya ste/ tha na sor mo gcig tsam sbyin pas kyang // 'gro ba'i chos kyi mchod rten la rim gro bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od
278a8(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i gtam nges par bstan pa 'di// rgya cher tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu ston to// gang gis gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing / 
278b1(mdo sde): rin chen bskang ste 'dren la phun pa pas// gang gis rkang pa'i sor mo gcig byin na// de bas bsod nams mchog 'di bye brag 'phags// bu ma don de nas shi 'phos nas/ 
278b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba stong dag mthong bar gyur// kun gyi bstan pa la yang rab byung nas// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di rab tu bzung // rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag thams cad ni/ 
278b3(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan 'das pa phyi dus na// de ni rtag par rab tu byung 'gyur te// bde gshegs sras mo kun nas nyon mongs med// mar me mdzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa yis// bstan
278b4(mdo sde): pa yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad// der yang bud med dngos dpo bsgyur nasu// de tshe de ni dge slong chos smrar gyur// / rtag tu dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin pa// mi dbang ye
278b5(mdo sde): shes stobs ni byams pa yin// mar me mdzad ni chos smra der gyur te// de tsheng ni rgyal po'i bu mor gyur/ lha mo sngon gyi snag gi gnyen gyur pa// mi dbang ye shes
278b6(mdo sde): stobs kyi phyir 'brang zhing // rgyal po'i rmi lam du yang ston pa ni// me 'khrugs spyad pa spyod tshe der gyur to// ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir// g.yo sgyu thams cad
278b7(mdo sde): yongasu spangs na su// bdag gi sha dag dang ni khrag gis kyang // chos smra ba la ngas kyang rim gro byas// dge slong na ba na tshas gzir ba de// gang dag mthong nas da tshe ngus pa yang
278b8(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par de dag rab gyur te// log par ltung ba'i sar ni yong ma song // de dag rtag tu mig kyang na ba med// klad pa'i nad med rna ba'i nad med de// sna yi nad med tshu
279a1(mdo sde): nad kyang med// so yang na bar rnams kyang mgyur to// dge slong na pa den su bsnyen pa/ de dag rtag tu kun nas mdzes par gyur// sum cu rtsa
279a2(mdo sde): gnyis bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan// dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis lus kyang 'bar// de dag nga yi bstan la rab byung nas// rab tu 'jigs dus byang chub dam pa 'di
279a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyang bzang nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba stong dag mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub mchog 'di legs par bzung na su// rtag tu ri mor byas shing
279a4(mdo sde): bcang byas na// de dag skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni// mi yi gtso bo mi 'khrugs mthong bar 'gyur// de dag spyod pa bla med 'di thos nas// dga' bzang rtsi
279a5(mdo sde): med pa 'phags pa tho// de dag bdag gi sngon smra thos nas ni// sangs rgyas dag la mchod pa rgya cher byed// dge slong mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan
279a6(mdo sde): mthong nas// g.yo med par ni rtag tu bsnyen par bya// zhe sdang tha ba dag kyang rnam spangs te// dge slong chos smra rtag tu bsnyen par gyis// gnod sems khro ba dag kyang rnam
279a7(mdo sde): songs la// nga yi sras po chos skyong mchod pa gyis// bskal pa bye ba mang por long ba dang // log par ltung zhing sdug bsngal gyur ta re// gcig la cig kyang gnod
279a8(mdo sde): sems byas nas ni// de la tshul khrims thos pa skyob mi nus// bsam gtan mi skyob dgon gnas skyob mi nus// sbyin pa mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min/ 
279b1(mdo sde): ye shes ldan gyi le'u ste sum cu lnga'o// / de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas/ thA gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te// 
279b2(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus
279b3(mdo sde): nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
279b4(mdo sde): rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe/ dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
279b5(mdo sde): to// de'i phyir kun dga' bo bdag go stan la 'dug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shis dang / 
279b6(mdo sde): dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas// ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
279b7(mdo sde): gsol to// zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs phye'o// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la skabs phye'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
279b8(mdo sde): bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnang ba dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stan la 'dug nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
280a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa dag/ lag pa bcad pa dang / rkang
280a2(mdo sde): pa bcad pa dang / rna ba bcad pa dang / sna bcad pa dang / mig dbyung ba dang / mgo bcad pa dang / lus bcad pa dang / yan lag bcad par 'gyur// sdug bsngal rnam pa
280a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags// rkyen gang lags/ de
280a4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
280a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par sgrub pa na ngas sdug bsnga/ ji snyed myong bar gyur pa khyod kyis shes shing de dag dran na// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di yongasu
280a6(mdo sde): dri bar sems/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rkang sa spyi bo'i bar du 'bar bar gyur te/ rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa de la/ skyes bu la
280a7(mdo sde): la zhig der nye bar 'ongs te/ skye skyes bu tshur shog/ lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par rtses shig/ dga' bar gyis shig/ yongasu
280a8(mdo sde): spyod cig ces zer na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te/ rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / 
280b1(mdo sde): yongasu spyod pa byed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ 
280b2(mdo sde): skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te// rtse ba dang / dga' ba dag la/ yongasu spyod pa byed du zin kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa sngon
280b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams ngan song gsum gyis sdug bsngal bar gyur cing dbul ba dag mthong nas yid bde ba 'am/ sems dga' ba ma byung // 
280b4(mdo sde): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na// tshul khrims mnyam pa dang / tshul khrims ma zhig
280b5(mdo sde): pa dang / tshul khrims 'dres ma ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang / tshul khrims ma g.yos pa dang / 
280b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims ma slongs pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'khrugs pa dang / tshul khrims mi yang ba dang / tshul khrims gzhan la ston pa ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims mi slu ba dang / tshul
280b7(mdo sde): khrims drang ba dang / tshul khrims dam bcas pa bzhin du byed pa dang / tshul khrims sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin te/ de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur// 
280b8(mdo sde): kun dgar bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa de dag ni lanang gcad pas yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur// rkang bcad pas yong su nyams
281a1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur/ rna ba cad pa dang / sna cad pas yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur/ mig phyung ba dang mgo cad pas yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur/ lus dang yan
281a2(mdo sde): cad pas yong su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ sdug sngal sna tshogs kyang mi myong la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
281a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// / bam po bcu gnyis pa// kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ kun dga' bo sngon byung
281a4(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med babs kyi dang ches grangs med pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis khyab dpa/ gzhal du med pa/ mtshungs pa med par gyur pa de'i
281a5(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su/ ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
281a6(mdo sde): pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad+ma'i zla ba'i rnam par dag pa/ mngon par 'phags pa'i
281a7(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung // yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rin po cher pad+ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
281a8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur gyur to// nyi ma thams cad la nyin re zhing yang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya
281b1(mdo sde): stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do// rab tu bkod cing yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu
281b2(mdo sde): med pa rnams zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod// rab tu bkod cing yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang
281b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// kun dga' bo de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad+ma'i zla ba rnam par dag
281b4(mdo sde): pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ lnga brgya
281b5(mdo sde): ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur ba na/ kun dga' bo rgyal po dpa' bas byin zhes bya ba zhig
281b6(mdo sde): byung ste/ rgyal po dpa' bas byin de la btsun mo'i 'khor ni bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// bu ni stong yod do// bu mo ni lnga brgya yod do// de'i tshe de'i dus na// rgyal
281b7(mdo sde): po dpa' bas byin gyi brgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yangs shing rgya che la sgo bzhi yod pa stegs dang / sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / pu shu dang / khang
281b8(mdo sde): pa dang / khang brtsegs pa dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi brgyan cing / rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa lha'i gnas bzhin du snang ba/ sems can grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i gnasu
282a1(mdo sde): gyur pa zhig yod do// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mdo sde 'di la bu dag ni skye bo mang pos smad cing / skye bo mang pos spangs te/ skye bo mang po dang mi 'phro
282a2(mdo sde): cing / skye bo mang pos bor bar gyur te/ 'jigs pa chen po mi zad pa'i dus gyur pa/ gtse ba mang zhing char ches pa'i dus kyi tshe/ char mi 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ dus ma yin par char 'bab
282a3(mdo sde): ba'i dus kyi tshe/ sbrul byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/ lce 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ mu gi 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/ log par lta ba'i dus kyi cha/ yang dag pa ma yin par lta ba'i dus kyi tshe// mu stegs can
282a4(mdo sde): gyi gsang sngags yang su tshol ba'i dus kyi cha/ sangs rgyas/ kyi byang chub tu 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong grong dang / grong khyer dang / 
282a5(mdo sde): grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'ar dang / ldongs nas bskrad nas/ de dag chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dang lhan cig kun tu bzang po zhes bya
282a6(mdo sde): ba'i nags khrod der rten cing gnas te/ dge slong de dag la gzung kyi chos kyi rna grangs 'di ston to// kun dga' bo nags khrod de yang dus thams cad du snang ba'i me tog sna tshogs dang / ste
282a7(mdo sde): ma dang / 'khri shing dang / 'bras bu dag dang ldan pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang 'dra ba/ shing sna tshogs kyis gang zhing sa rig ni yang gzugs dang kha dog drim dang / sa bon dang myu gu thams
282a8(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan pa/ zag dang rdob sna tshogs mdzes shing dri ma med pa/ yang shing mtho ba dang / gser gyi ri dag gis mdzes par byas shing sdug pa/ grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang dang / 
282b1(mdo sde): dri za dang / skyes bu'am/ drang srong dang / mi 'am ci dag gnas pa byad gzugs dang / kha dog che zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po gnas pa/ sangs rgyas du ma bzhugs bzhugs pa dang / 
282b2(mdo sde): tshal dang 'dra bar kun tu bzang zhing rnal 'byor dang 'thun pa'i nags tshal dam pa/ kun tu bzang po de na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnal 'byor la rje su brtson zhing gnas par gyur to// yang
282b3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de gcig pu dben par song nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs te/ lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas bltas na/ byang chub sems
282b4(mdo sde): dpa' khrag khrig mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas/ 'dir skyes te/ de dag ga/ zungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa rnyed na ni/ bla na med pa
282b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'a/ gyur/ gal te gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan ba ma rnyed na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
282b6(mdo sde): las phyir ldog pa dag mthong ngo // de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dran shes bzhin du ting 'dzin lnga langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po ga la yod pa der song ste phyin nas/ byang
282b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu dag kho bo ni 'gro'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong mdab dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po
282b8(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor du song la sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag gis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes la 'di skad ces smra so// khyod nag
283a1(mdo sde): khrod 'di nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'gro ba ni/ kho bo cag 'dod pa ma yin no// 
283a2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mang po dam pa'i chos spong ba dag byung ba'i dus la bab kyis/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa
283a3(mdo sde): srog gcod par gyur na ma legaso// tshe dang ldan pa ni shin tu mdzes shing byad bzhin bzang la blta na sdug te/ dang po'i lang tshe dang ldan zhing / na chod dngal bab ste/ mdog ni gser bcom
283a4(mdo sde): bzang ba 'dra/ 'bral ba ni dung dang zla ba dang / me tog kun ranga'i kha dog lta bu'i mdzod spras brgyan/ skra dang gtsug de tor ni mthon 'thing la lung lor la khril ba yin pas/ rgyal
283a5(mdo sde): bo'am/ rgyal po'i blon po 'am/ de dang 'dra ba gzhan dag kyang phrag dog dang / 'jugs zhon pa'i sem kyis/ khyo kyi srog bcad nam leg so// de nas chos smrab me tog
283a6(mdo sde): bla mdzes kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad du gal te kho bos bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na/ kho bos 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas brtsa/ 
283a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bstan pa bsrung bar mi 'gyuraro zhes zer nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// bdag du 'du shes 'di la gnas nasu/ bstan pa 'di la bsrung bar yod mi nus/ 
283a8(mdo sde): mi bzad byi dus bde bar gshegs pa yi// byang chub bstan pa bkod pa chen po yin// gang gis bdag tu 'du shes kun spangs shing // sems can 'di dag gang zag sgra rnams dang / 
283b1(mdo sde): gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ngo rnams dang / reg bya stong ba den bstan pa srung // bskam bye ba gang+gA'i byi skyed du/ dang ba'i sems kyis zas dang skom rnams dang // gdugs dang ba danam
283b2(mdo sde): me'i phreng ba yos// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rim gro byas// gang gis dam chos rab tu 'jig pa dang / bde gshegs bstan pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe// nyin mtshan
283b3(mdo sde): du ni bslab pa gcig spyod pa// bsod nams 'di ni de bas bye brag 'phags// skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni dam pa'i chos// 'jig par 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms sgom// de yin
283b4(mdo sde): rgyal bkur sti byas ma yin// 'dren pa dag la ri mor des dam byas// khyed bde rang gi don gyis la// bdag de nyid rab tu bsrung bar gyis// khyed ni rtag tu byams gan+da/ 
283b5(mdo sde): shing / 'dul ba 'di la bag yod kyis// ma 'dres dag gtsang dri med pa// tshul khrims drang por bsrung bar rgyu sa// gang gis tshul khrims dri ma med// sangs rgyas
283b6(mdo sde): bsngags pa bsrungs pa ni// de yis ji snyed sngon byung ba// bde gshegs thams cad ri mor byas// de yis thams cad bskyabs pa yin// skye bo'i tshogs rnams byang chub bkod
283b7(mdo sde): sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis bstod pa yis// tshul khrims dri ma med pa sus bsrungs pa// de dag gis ni sems can mang po yang // sems can myal ba dang ni sdig las grangs// chos
283b8(mdo sde): mchog rin chen sbyin pa sbyin par gyis// bzod pa dag kyang rtag tu bsrungs gyis la// dgon par gnas shing ting 'dzin mkhas pa dang // 'jam zhing mnyen pa dag kyang bsgom par
284a1(mdo sde): gyis// rnam pa kun tu rtsod pa ma byed par// spyad pa ni mchog 'di la rnam par spyod// bdag ni sems can rnams kyang bskyab pa'i phyir// grong dang / 
284a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro bar bya// blo gros che 'chang sems can dam pa'i mchog/ drang srong de ni 'gro bar byas pa dang // kha cig rkang pa la yang 'ju bar byed// snying rje bar yang
284a3(mdo sde): ngu zhing mchi ma zag/ mkhas pa blo gros chen po ma bzhud par// sgra 'jam yid 'ong zhing mdzes pa yi// shing 'di rnams la gzigs shing rtog pa mdzod// bdag nyid bsru
284a4(mdo sde): ba mdzod la ma bzhud cig/ sngon gyi stobs bcu 'dren pa de dag kyang // dbang po zhi zhing shin tu nges pa rnams// nags tshal brag dang ri'i rtser gshegs nas// byang chub dam pa
284a5(mdo sde): dag ni thug su chud// byang chub rgyu yang spyod pa dam pa spyad// dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan// de dag rje sa spobs nags khrod gnas par mdzod// brtul zhugs
284a6(mdo sde): bzang po 'di nas ma bzhud cig/ lus ni shin tu mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan// khyod kyi sku yang mthon ting kha dog ste// gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba 'od byed pa// sa 'di kun kyang rab tu
284a7(mdo sde): snang bar gyur// khyod kyi mdzod spu bzhin gyi smin mtshams na// shin tu mdzes pa dung dang 'dra ba'i 'od// rgyal po dag kyang de bzhin srid kyi phyir// phrag dog bskyed nas khyod
284a8(mdo sde): kyi lus bshig 'gyur// de nas chos smra me tog zla mdzes kyis// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la tshogasu bcad pas smras pa/ ji snyed sngon gyi bder gshegs byung
284b1(mdo sde): ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen cing zag pa zad pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'jig rten don mdzad// srid pa gsum du byang chub dam pa rtogs/ spyad pa'i dam pa byang chub rgyu spyad de/ 
284b2(mdo sde): de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan// de yis rjes bslabs byang chub sems dpa' yang // sems can khrag khrig rnams kyi skyabs byed 'dod// drang srong mkhas la
284b3(mdo sde): kun gyis bskor byas te// rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshal shugs phyung nas// mi zed snying rje bar ni sgra 'byin cing // nyam thag mi bde chongs 'debs par byed/ kha cig rab
284b4(mdo sde): tu 'gyel cing brgyal na su// sa la lhung ba sa la bcad 'gyel/ bzhin// 'on kyang drang srong sems can don 'ad dad pa// bsod nams bsags pas de las phyir ma log
284b5(mdo sde): drang srong chos gos lhung bzed thogs nas chas// ji ltar seng ge ral pa can dag bzhin// de ni chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pas na// de la yon tan nyes par bya ba
284b6(mdo sde): med/ 'jig rten 'dir ni nags khrod bdag gnas pas// sems can ngan song song na ma legs shes// de ni sems can bslab pa'i don gyi phyir// grong khyer pho brang mchog tu
284b7(mdo sde): song ba gyur// de nas chos smra me tog zla mdzes// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas sems can rnams la chos
284b8(mdo sde): bstan te// de snga dro dor 'ongs nas srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do// da dung rgyal
285a1(mdo sde): po'i pho brang der ma phyin nas de mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der phyin pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der nye bar song
285a2(mdo sde): ste/ shing blag sha dang / sa la'i drung du 'dug/ de de'i nub mo 'das pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan du zhugs par gyur te/ zhugs nas srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug sangs
285a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos la phyir mi ldog par bkod kyang // da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byaso// de zlags dpa nga na rgyal po 'khor rin chen ldan byung ste// c+doMs kyi sin me'i mchod na gang na 'od pa deng so// 'greng zhing du nyin mtshan 'das pa/ 
285a4(mdo sde): byas/ de de'i nub mo 'das nas/ de'i snga dro gnyis pa/ la/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/ srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu gsum sangs rgyas
285a5(mdo sde): kyi chos las phyir mo ldog par bkod de// da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas// de zas gnyis pa gcad pa ba de nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung
285a6(mdo sde): ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste// 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byaso// de de'i nub mo 'das nas/ de snga dro gsum pa la rgyal
285a7(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/ srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de/ da dung zas kyi bya ba
285a8(mdo sde): ma bya'o// de zas gsum pa gcad pabacad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mi na nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng ban/ 
285b1(mdo sde): dunyin mtshan 'das par bya'o// de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro ban pa la/ rgyal po'i 'brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/ sgrog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu ba
285b2(mdo sde): rtsa dgu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de// da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byaso// de zas bzhi pa gcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
285b3(mdo sde): rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byaso// de de'i nub mo 'das nas/ de snga dro lnga pa la
285b4(mdo sde): btsun po'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas/ bud med brgyad khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod// grong khyer de nas kyang sems can
285b5(mdo sde): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldag par bko/ de/ da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byaso// de nyi ma lnga zas gcad
285b6(mdo sde): pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das
285b7(mdo sde): par byaso// de de'i nub mo 'das nas/ de snga dro drug pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i bu stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
285b8(mdo sde): ldog par bkod de/ de dung zas kyi bya ba ma byaso// de nyi ma drug zas gcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod
286a1(mdo sde): ba der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das pa byas// de de'i nub mo 'das nas/ de snga dro bdun pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs na rgyal
286a2(mdo sde): po dpa' bas byin skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba mthong ste/ gser gyi shing rta la ngos ni dngul/ mda' sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan/ 'khor lo ni bai dUr+ya/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgre
286a3(mdo sde): ba dang / rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ shing rtar mda' la dar gyis dkris shing ras btsas bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa de/ bu mo gzho nu brgyad brgyas rin po che'i tha gus gtags ni/ 
286a4(mdo sde): 'dren te/ de dag byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/ byis da pa rnams dga' bar byed cing tshim par byed pa ste/ mkhas pa
286a5(mdo sde): rnams la ni ma yino// rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lte bu brgyad khri bzhi stong zham ring mtho dman du 'gro'o// pra ma ze shing sa la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang nam ri
286a6(mdo sde): mthon dman du 'gro'o// khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zham ring mthon dman du 'gro'o// rgyal po'i bu mo lnga brgya yang rin po che'i phyogs kyi nang du zhugs nas mdun
286a7(mdo sde): thog thag tu 'gro ste/ de dag gis dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// btsun mo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyang / 
286a8(mdo sde): dge slong de mthong ma thag tu/ bla na med pa pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang nor bu dang / gdu bu rnams bkrol te/ lham
286b1(mdo sde): rnams bzhags nas/ thA gos phra ba gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ dge slong de log su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod// de nas rba
286b2(mdo sde): mo gzhonu de dag kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bas/ khyogs de dag las babs nas/ nor bu dang / gdu bu dag bkrol te/ lham rnams bzhag nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
286b3(mdo sde): bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ dge slong deg la ba de log su thal mo sbyar te tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras// dge slong 'di ni byon pa'i tshe/ nyi ma lta bur thams
286b4(mdo sde): cad du/ 'di dag rab tu snang bar bgyis// skye bo'i tshogs kyang 'dun par gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang rgyun bca dra cing // gti mug dag kyang bsal bar gyur// de tshe zhe sdang
286b5(mdo sde): khro ba dang // phrag dog thams cad bcad par gyur/ la po dpa' bas byin pa yi// zham ring sras las so// gas pa yang // su yang rgyal po mi lnga ste// su yang zhe/ 
286b6(mdo sde): ring mi bgyid do// ji ltar zla ba nya ba ni// skar ma dag gis bskor ba bzhin// rgyal po'i bu'i mdun bdar bas// dge slong 'di yang mdzes par 'gyur// ji ltar gser gzugs ri mo dag/ 
286b7(mdo sde): mkhas pas ri mor bris pa dang // sa la'i rgyal po rgyas pa ltar// de bzhin dge slong mdzes par gyur// mthu chen brgya byin lha'i dbang po ni// grong khyer 'jig pa bdag po mig stong ldan// 
286b8(mdo sde): ri rab spyi la sum cu rtsa gsum dbang // de bzhin dge slong byon pa 'di yang mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa gnas pa 'dra// rab 'phrul lha yi bu ni lha dbang bzhin// 'dod
287a1(mdo sde): khams 'tha' bral mchog gi lha bzhin du// dge slong byon pa 'di yang de bzhin mdzes// nyi ma bzhin du bar snang lhan ner bgyis// 'od zer stong ldan mun nag rang
287a2(mdo sde): tu sel// phyogs rnams kun tu snang ba bgyid pa ltar// de bzhin dge slong byon pa mdzes par gyur// bskal pa mtha' yas rgya cher sbyin pa byin// tshul khrims ma 'dres rtag tu bsrung ba
287a3(mdo sde): bgyis/ bzod pa mtshungs med 'jig rten kun tu bsgoms// de ni mtshan gyis brgyan cing 'di ltar mdzes// 'phags pa'i skye bos rab stod brtson 'grus bskyed// bsam gtan bzhi sa
287a4(mdo sde): bum med sems kyis bsnyen// nyon mongs dra ba bsal tsadas rab skyed// de phyir dge slong 'jig rten kun tud dga'// sangs rgyas bstan pa mtshungs med sems can sna/ 
287a5(mdo sde): po ste dpa' bo 'das pas chos mchog dag kyang rab tu bshad/ ma 'ongs dus dang de bzhin da ltar byung ba yis/ sa kyi rgyal po dbang brnyes rnams kyi sras de lags// da
287a6(mdo sde): slong khyod na mi rtag nam yang ma gyur cig/ gzugs ni 'di ltar 'jig rten kun na rab tu ldan// bzi brjid che zhing dbyangs sgra shin tu sman par gdanga' // rgyal po gzi brjid shin tu lum
287a7(mdo sde): me snang mi bgyid// chos 'di ji ltar khyod bdag nyid kyis rab rtogs shing // sangs rgyas dag gis bka' stsal 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de bzhin bdag cag bud med dngos po kun spangs
287a8(mdo sde): bdag cag thams cad dge slong 'di bzhin 'gyur bar bgyi// de dag thams thams cad sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas nas// tshigs bcad 'di dag spras te gos rnams 'thor bar byed// ga
287b1(mdo sde): gyi 'phreng ba dang ni rin chen do shal dang // rna ba'i rgyan dang mgul gyi rgyan dag rnam mang mthor// ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag/ stobs ldanas 'di kun la rnam par lta// srasu 'du
287b2(mdo sde): shes dag ni nye bar 'jog/ gling rnams bzhi po 'di dag kun tu 'gro/ rgyal rigs dang ni tshong dpon bram ze dang // khyim bdag mkhar gyi rgyal po bdag gi mo// de dag gcig la lhag par
287b3(mdo sde): sdug pa med// thams cad la yang byams pa mnyam par skyed// de bzhin dge slong nges pa 'di yang ni// gzungs dang dbang rnams la ni shin tu bslabs// byang chub yan lag stobs
287b4(mdo sde): dang dbang po dang // yan lag brgyad ldan lam yang rnam par 'byed// mtshan mo zla ba skar tshogs dbus na yang // ji ltar rab tu mdzes par snang ba bzhin// ji ltar nyi ma'i
287b5(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe// gzi brjid ldan zhing rnam pa/ ra snang bgyid bzhin// dbang po zhi zhing stobs bculnga na ba yi// sangs rgyas des pa kun la phyag 'tshalo// de dag
287b6(mdo sde): gis ni bsngags pa bskal pa brgyas// zad par byed nus skyes bu su yang med// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por ni// yon tan brjod kyang zad pa yong med de// 'jig rten rab mcho// 
287b7(mdo sde): gi ni spu gcig kyang // bsngags pa dag ni zad par mi 'gyur ro// des ni mtshungs med 'khor lo rab tu bskor// ye shes dag gi gnas kyang shin tu bstan// zhib cing rdul bral chos rnams
287b8(mdo sde): bshad pa mdzad// de ni gang na 'ang snang bar 'gyur ba med// dge sbyong dang ni bram ze lha dang klu/ lha men bdud dang tshangs par bcas la sogs// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i
288a1(mdo sde): yon tan gyis// rgya mtsho dag ni zad par yong mi nus// gang gis thugs sras 'di 'dra mnga' ba yi// sman rgyal mtshungs med rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// tshig
288a2(mdo sde): bcad 'di dag smras nas de'i tshe// rgyal po'i bu mo gnonu thams cad dga'// gser dang gser phye dag kyang 'thor bar byed// gos rnams kyang ni rab tu 'ding bar byed// gtsug gi
288a3(mdo sde): nor bu do shal mdzes pa dag/ rin tang bye ba phrag ni brgya ri bas// dge slong de la mngon par g.yogs nas ni// dga' nas byang chub phyir yang rab tu zhugs// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas
288a4(mdo sde): byin 'di snyam du sems te// kye btsun mo'i 'khor 'di/ ngag ni log par zhugs te// skye bo'i tshogs kyang / gago sa mo// skye bo de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu bkrol
288a5(mdo sde): gzhag nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas// dge slo ngade ga la ba de lag su thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tsha'o// dge
288a6(mdo sde): slong de byang gzugs bzang ba tsam du rgyal po dpa' bas byin byang bzhin mi bzang // de tsam du blta na sdug pa ma yin// de tsam du mdzes pa ma yin te/ de rgyal po srid kyi phyir shin tu sngangs
288a7(mdo sde): par gyur to// dge slong de'i gzugs kyi lus yong su rdzogs pa mthong nas shin tu khros so// dge slong de rgyal po'i lam na 'dug pa'i mig tu rdul song ba dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong
288a8(mdo sde): 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas te/ 'dis mig gis brda' byaso// de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'di la srog gcod par byed pa su yod snyam mo// 
288b1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi nam ring du bu stong 'brang ba de dag bos nas/ gzhonu dag dge slong 'di srog dang phrol cig ces byas na/ gzhon de dag rgyal po dpa' bas byin la skar
288b2(mdo sde): zlog go// dge slong de'i phyir de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu dag kyang bka' mi nyan te/ bdag gcig pu gnyi su med par bzhag na/ de dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed pa su
288b3(mdo sde): yod snya mo// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin la bsad pa'i gshed ma dga' byed ces bya ba gtum po btsam pa med pa/ ma rungs pa zhig yod pa de rgyal po'i lam na/ rgyal po dang
288b4(mdo sde): bas byin dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go// rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis de mthong nas dga' mgu yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes
288b5(mdo sde): nas/ de sems 'di snyam du sems te/ dga' byed 'dis dge slong 'di srog dang dbral bar byed snyamo// de na/ sa bsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed rgyal po dpa' bas byin
288b6(mdo sde): gang na 'dug pa der 'ongs pa dang / dga' byed la 'di skad ces smras// khyod bya dga' cher sbyin na/ dga' byed khyod dge slong 'di srog dang dpral bar byed nus sam// dga' byed
288b7(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ lha shin tu rngo thog go// bka' bzhin 'tshal// dge slong 'di srog de 'bral bar 'tshalo// rgyal pos smras pa/ dga' byed de'i phyir de'i dus la da bab par shes na// mtsha/ 
288b8(mdo sde): rnon po thogs la dge slong 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa chod cig/ rna ba dang sna yang chod cig/ 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas kyis/ de'i phyir 'di'i mig kyang
289a1(mdo sde): skam pas phyung shig ces byaso// de nas gsod pa'i gshed dga' byed kyis/ de'i tshe ral gyi rnon po thogs nas dge slong de'i lag pa dang rkang pa bcad// na
289a2(mdo sde): ba dang sna yang bcad do// mig gnyis kyang phyung ngo // de nas dge slong de'i mgo dang rna ba dang / rkang lag gtsad pa las/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang byung / 'o ma'i rgyun
289a3(mdo sde): du ma yang byung ste/ phyogs bcur bskor nas/ slar yang dge slong de'i lus kyi nang du nub bo// bcad cing btubs pa'i 'phro nas/ dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / 'khor lo la sogs
289a4(mdo sde): pa nang nas byung ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa ga/ nyis kun snang ngo // de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs che dan po dang dong nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po des dge slong de'am
289a5(mdo sde): na bcad gtubs shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ ngo mtshar du gyur nas ngu ning cho nges btab ste/ smre sngags bston nas/ phyir yang rgyal
289a6(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan par song ngo // de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin zhag bdun 'das pa dang / skyed mos tshal mchog 'dug pa mi dga' mi rtse/ yongasu mi spyod de/ skye mos tshal nas
289a7(mdo sde): de log nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang / des dge slong de rgyal po'i lam du bor ba shi nas zhag bdun lon yang / lus kyi mdog ma
289a8(mdo sde): gyur pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'di'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa las bstan/ dge slong 'di ni mdog mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
289b1(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/ bdag gi sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes par 'gyur ba'i sdig pa'i las byas kyis// bdag ni myur du sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur
289b2(mdo sde): zhes de de ltar sems pa na/ steng gi bar snang las lha'i bu brgyad khris sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu smras pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ni de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba ltar/ dge slong 'di ni
289b3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no zhes zer ro// bar snang las lha dag gi sgra thos nas/ de shin tu 'jigs shing skrag nas/ bag tsha zhing spu
289b4(mdo sde): zing zhes byed de/ 'gyod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ 'gyod bar gyur pas/ de'i tshe cho nge cher btab nas// tshig 'di skad
289b5(mdo sde): ze ro / rgyal po'i srid dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang / nor bu rin ma du tig gser dbyig spang // bdag nyid mtshon blo/ gas bdag nyid 'chi bar bya// bdag ni byis pa'i blo tsa
289b6(mdo sde): las ngan ldan// dge slong me tog zla mdzes 'dir byung ba// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go bgos te// snang bar byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs// zla ba nya tshe skar ma'i rgyal po
289b7(mdo sde): bzhin/ 'dod pa'i long spyod ngan pas bdag dkrugs te// rab tu dga' bar bud med tshogs rnams dang // shing rta'i nang du zhugs te de nas dong // rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongasu 'khor bar bskor// 
289b8(mdo sde): dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'di nyid ni// 'dir byon dge slong de'ang mthong na su// bud med tshogs rnams rab tu dga' gyur cing // mos pa skyes nas gser gyi 'phreng ba gtor// thaMd
290a1(mdo sde): sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar byas nas// tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis dge slong de stod// rgyal po yi na klu yi dbyangs sgra rnams// de dag thams cad rab tu ni gyu
290a2(mdo sde): deyang shing rta'i nang du zhugs nas ni// rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongasu bskor bar gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras mchog mthu che ba// dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'dir byon no// 
290a3(mdo sde): bdag gi sems ni rab tu ngan gyur te// dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug pa'i tshe// bud med tshogs chen dga' ba lta mthong nas// rmongs pas de la phrag dog khro ba skyed// phyogs
290a4(mdo sde): bani kun tu snang bar bgyis pa ni// zla ba sgra gcan zin thar mdzes pa bzhin// dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug mthong nas// bud med tshogs rnams dga' zhing sgra yang 'byin
290a5(mdo sde): bdag gis der ni gtum pa'i cho ga smras te// bu stong dag la da nyid khyed song la// dge slong 'di ni dum bu du/ ma bur gyis// 'di ni nga yi dgra mchog ma rungs pa/ 
290a6(mdo sde): bzhon nu thams cad mnyes zhing tshul ldan te// bdag la phan sems dge slong de la 'dud// rgyal po 'di 'dra'i bka' bzhin bgyir mi rung // de tshe bdag ni mya ngan non par gyur// 
290a7(mdo sde): dge slong shin tu tshul khrims mchog ldan pa// byams ldan pa bzhin zhugs pa mthong nas ni// shin tu gtum pa'i sems kyis gsod du gtang // phyi dus bdag ni lhung
290a8(mdo sde): nas mnar med sreg/ dga' byed de ni rgyal po'i lam 'dir gnas// ma rungs las bgyi mi la sdug bsngal bskyed// bdag gi bka' bzhin de 'dra rang bgyis te// me tog 'phreng ba rgyus
290b1(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i dge slong gtubs// nags mchog kun tu bzang po dga' ba na// bya yis gang zhing me tog dri zhim rgyas// de ni dge slong tshogs gzhan rab mang ba// bu
290b2(mdo sde): gcig pa ni ma dang bral bzhin// dge slong bzhengs la nags su gnas par mdzod// mi yi don kyang shin tu rgya cher bgyis// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir byon pa'i tshe// dge slong shin tu snying rje
290b3(mdo sde): ngu zhing tshol// lag pa g.yas pas me tog rgyal mtshan thogs// g.yon pa yis kyang blta sdug mdzes pa gzhan// lam yang sbyangs shing gos kyis khebs par g.yogs// dge slong bzhengs
290b4(mdo sde): las chos mchog bshad pa mdzod// rgyal po'i khab 'ang dar khyod zhugs ring lon yang // dge slong rab tu snying rje dar ngu zhing tshol// rgyal ba mchog gi snyan pa 'jig pa'i tshe// 
290b5(mdo sde): khyod kyi srog gi bar chad 'gyur du dogs// ji ltar skyes du/ mthu chen la la dag/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gtu sgra grags pa// srid gsum 'di kun thams cad zil man// 
290b6(mdo sde): nas 'gayang sa chen por mchongs te sar ltung ltar// de bzhin dge slong mtshan mchog rab brgyan pa// byad bzhin bzang po sa 'dir 'gyel bar gyur// me tog zla mdzes zhe sdang gtum med
290b7(mdo sde): bdag gis sdig pa'i sems kyis dum bur blags// me tog zla mdzes bkrong nas sar lhung ba// chos smra 'di ni mthong nas myur bar yang // dge slong thams cad sdug bsngal gzir gyur te// 
290b8(mdo sde): mi dga' skyes 'gyur de bzhin sems mi bde// me tog zla mdzes ri yi rgyal po ltar// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te// 'phreng ba brgyus pa bud med thogs pa 'dra// 'dir
291a1(mdo sde): ni dum bu dum bur rnam par bcad// bdag gis dngos sdig shin tu mi zad bgyis// mgon med mnar med gshin rje'i yul du mchi// 'dir yang dge slong
291a2(mdo sde): dum bur blags pa yis// bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang ring bas ring // bdag gis shin tu las ngan bgyis pas na// bu dang gnyen bshes tshogs rnams skyabs mi 'gyur// blon po/ 
291a3(mdo sde): dang ni zham ring bkram pa yang // de dag dmyal bar bdag srong skyabs mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang // phyogs bcu dag na gang su bzhugs pa yi// ded dpon
291a4(mdo sde): stobs bcu nyon mongs med pa rnams// rdo rje sdug sra sku mnga'i skyabasu mchi// der ni dge slong dum bur byas mthong denas// lha rnams rab tu snying rje tshe nges 'debs// de dag
291a5(mdo sde): der song dge 'dun go bar byas// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po/ 'i khab 'dir bsad// chos smra ba ni mkhas shing rtog/ sa pa de// mthu chen phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab tu
291a6(mdo sde): grags// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la gnas pa de// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin// tshul khrims mi g.yo
291a7(mdo sde): bskyed med gang srung zhing // 'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med bzod sgom pa// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// bskal pa mtha' yas rtag tu brtson ldan zhing // zhum
291a8(mdo sde): med sems kyis bsam gtan bani la snyoms// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i shes rab gang bsnyen pa// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// lus la phangs pa thams cad
291b1(mdo sde): rab spangs shing // de bzhin srog la ma chags gyur nas na// kun tu bzang po'i nags nas babs nasu// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// lha ma tsha nga'i sbyang
291b2(mdo sde): rje thos nas ni// dge slong de kun shin tu sdug bsngal nas// me tog zla mdzes nyes med bsad pa la// lta ba'i phyir yang thams cad grong du lhags// nges pa de dag rgyal po'i khab
291b3(mdo sde): 'ongs nas// dge slong dum bu dum bu byas mthong ste// nyam thag skad kyis mi zad cho nges 'debs// de dag thams cad brgyal nas sa la 'gyel// dge slong dge 'dun rgyal po de la sna
291b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams pa yi// dge slong / dades ni nyes pa ci zhig byas// 'di ni sngon gyi skye ba bsam yas dran// 'di ni ye shes gzungs dbang pha rol
291b5(mdo sde): phyin 'di na 'dus byas 'di dag stong par shes// 'di ni 'gro ba dag la mtshan med ston// 'di ni smon lam 'du shes thams cad spangs// 'di ni yid 'ong snyan
291b6(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byin// 'di ni des shing dbang po rab tu zhi// 'di ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol phyin// 'jig rten thams cad las kyang mngon par 'phags// 'di ni sangs rgyas
291b7(mdo sde): rang byung ye shes kyis// khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten ri mor byas// dag tsang rab rib med pa'i mig gis lta// byams pa dang ni stong rje shin tu che// 'dod pa ngan cing brtsom
291b8(mdo sde): la sdug bsngal bskyed// mtho ris rnam par ma rung byed pa ste// 'dod pa bsnyen narna ba med par 'gyur// mi dag shes rab dang yang bral bar 'gyur// ma rnams 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas
292a1(mdo sde): na/ long bar 'gyur zhing pha dang ma yang gsod// 'dod pa bsnyen byas tshul khrims ldan pa gsod// de bas ni yis 'dod pa rnam par spang // rgyal pos 'dod
292a2(mdo sde): pa dag ni gnyen byas na// sa bdag dam pa 'byor pa 'di bor nas// mi zad sdug bsngal rtsub byed sems dmyal nas// sems can dmyal ba 'jig sde por 'gro/ 'di 'dra'i dge slol mkhas
292a3(mdo sde): pa gsod byed de// sdig pa'i la rnams rtag tu byed par 'gyur// de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa// sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs spang bar bya// lus ni sgyu ma gsog dang 'dra ba dang // 
292a4(mdo sde): de bzhin rna mig sna lce rig nas ni// gzugs dang sgra dang de de bzhin dra mchog dang // reg bya chos rnams zhum me du sems kyis gtong // byin pa bslabs shing tshul khrims
292a5(mdo sde): mnyam pa med// bzod pa dang ni de bzhin brtson 'grus te// bsam gtan sten cing shes rab pha rol song // sems can dag gi don kyang rab tu byed// 'jig rten
292a6(mdo sde): lha dang mir bcas thams cad kyang // byams pas rgyal ba la ni rab tu lta// de phyir mig ni mun nag gtibs gyur kyang // byang chub zhi ba nyid ni 'tshang rgya 'gyur// rta dang bal glang yang
292a7(mdo sde): thog bri rnams dang // khyogs dang sngas rnams kyang ni de bzhin te// glang po dag dang gzhon dang dgal ba dang // grong dang yul 'khor dga' bas gtong bar byed// grong khyer
292a8(mdo sde): dang ni rgyal srid yongs gtong zhing // gser dang dngul dang shel dang byi ru dang // de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bu mo dang // rang gi mgo yang gtong zhing byang chub zhugs// me tog
292b1(mdo sde): dang ni spos dang bdug pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lha yi ba dan dang // rol ma'i cha byad sna tshogs thogs nas ni// dga' nas mchod pa mtshungs pa med pa byed// 
292b2(mdo sde): pa dag ni stong par shes nas kyang // srid pa'i 'gro ba dag la dga' mi byed// de phyir stobs bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyan cing // phyogs bcu thams cad du yang snang bar byed// byang
292b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// 'dod pa'i khams rnams dang ni gzugs kyi khams// gzugs med khams la de dag mi chags te// khams gsum dag
292b4(mdo sde): la snga nas chags pa med// byang chub sems dpa' gzu/ dngas la gang gnas pa// bdag tu 'du shes sems/ can 'du shes med// srog du 'du shes gang zag 'du
292b5(mdo sde): med/ tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres rtag tu spyad// byang chu ba sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// da sa por 'du shes dngos med 'du shes med// bde bar 'du/ 
292b6(mdo sde): shes mi bder 'du shes med// grangasu 'du shes grangs med 'du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med// 
292b7(mdo sde): bud med 'du shes skyes par 'du shes med// grong gi 'du shes grong khyer 'du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// yul 'khor 'du shes grong 'dab
292b8(mdo sde): 'du shes med// 'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med// zhe sdang 'du shes sdang bral 'du shes med// gti mug 'du shes rmongs bral 'du shes meng// byang chub
293a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// nga rgyal nga rgyal bral ba'i 'du shes med// ma rig ma rig ma yon 'du shes med// lha dang / kham/ 
293a2(mdo sde): yin 'du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// de dag dbang po stobs la mi chags te// byang chub yan lan bsam gtan chags pa med// khams
293a3(mdo sde): gsum nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong // 'dod chags chags med zhe sdang gtum pa med// gti mug rmongs med rtag tu g.yo med 'gyur// sangs rgyas stobs bcu mthong
293a4(mdo sde): nas bkur bsti byed// blo gros ldan pa mtho ris sngon mi b+he dad // su dag gzhan las chos mchog thos nas ni// de la nam yang nem nur mi byed pa// 'bru mar gad
293a5(mdo sde): pa'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag/ bcad dang ma bcad gzha na gyi blo yang shes// mdza' ba byas na rje su chags pa skye// de yang nyon mongs pa ni chen po yin// 
293a6(mdo sde): zhe sdang byas na khong khro skye bar 'gyur// dgra dang 'dzags pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung // 'di gnyis rab tu rnam par spang byas te// blo gros ldan pa dag ni byang chub zhugs// 
293a7(mdo sde): de dag mi yi khyu mchog stobs bcur ni// 'jig rten du yang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur// nang dang phyi rol dag kyang rnam spangs te// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab gnas shing // 
293a8(mdo sde): tshul khrims phung po dag kyang rnam par sbyangs// ral ba med cing ma 'dres skyon yang med// nam yang de dag gi ni tshul khrims dag/ 'phags shing 'dres pa dag du mi 'gyur
293b1(mdo sde): te/ mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas// blo gros 'chang ba byang chub ni rtogs 'gyur// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin// dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos snang
293b2(mdo sde): me tog zla mdzes kyi yon gyi bye brag chen po yangs shing rgya che ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la tshogasu bcad
293b3(mdo sde): pas slar smras pa// nags khrod stug po kun tu bzang po ni// sdong po chen pos gang zhing 'bras bu mdzes// dus kun skye ba me tog sdug pas brgyan// sna tshogs tha dad bya rnams sgra yang/ 
293b4(mdo sde): 'byin/ gser gyi ri seng mdzes shing mtho bas brgyan// mi 'am ci da'i glu dbyangs snyan pa dang // rol mo shin tu thabs ldan yod 'ong grag/ grub pa'i bu mo rtag tu gar yang byed/ 
293b5(mdo sde): nags de lha'i dga' ba'i tshal bzhin te// gzugs bzang gzung gas 'bar ba'i shing gis dkrigs// me tog rna ma pa sna tshogs tha dad bkram// ud pal pad+mos brgyan
293b6(mdo sde): cing chu yang 'bab// 'di 'dra ba'i nags mchog nyams dga' ba// drang srong rtag tu gnas par 'thun pa dag/ bor nas sems can don dang phan bzhed pas// sdig pa'i phung po bdag
293b7(mdo sde): drung grong du byon// de ltar chos smra yon tan 'chang ba 'di// me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te// byon nas sdig pa bgyid pa bdag gis dkrongs// 'di dkrongs pas ni bdag
293b8(mdo sde): kyang dmyal bar ltung // byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i stobs ldan gang // dpa' bo sems can phan phyir 'jig rten spyod// de dag sdig bgyid bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig/ 
294a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de skyabs bdag mchi'o// gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa ni// gang gzhan nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste// zag pazad rtsi
294a2(mdo sde): tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa// bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med mchi ba skyobs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// de lta bas
294a3(mdo sde): na kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus dang srog la ma chags par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo lus dang srog la chags pa'i sems/ 
294a4(mdo sde): can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyu/ ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rtag tu rul/ pa'i lus 'di dang / srog kyang g.yo zhing dbang med de// 
294a5(mdo sde): rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra ba la// sems can gang dag chags pa ni// shin tu ma rungs las byas nas// gti mug dbang song de dag ni// sems can dmyal ba mi bzang
294a6(mdo sde): par/ mi mkhas bdud kyi gzhol bas song // dbu ba rdos 'dra'i lus dang ni// chi yi chu bur 'dra srog la// mi gang chags par mi byed pa// de dag 'gro ba mchog tu 'gro/ 
294a7(mdo sde): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin 'di 'dod
294a8(mdo sde): pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'dod pas/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar bya ste// mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba
294b1(mdo sde): lta bus brtson 'grus brtsams pas// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de// dper na dben pa na bde bar gnas pa dang / dgon pa dang / nags khrod
294b2(mdo sde): spangs te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang / ljongs dang / yul khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / ri khrod rnam su zhugs te/ ci nas sems can de dag nyan thos kyi
294b3(mdo sde): byang chub dang / rang sangs kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams la
294b4(mdo sde): chos bstan par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sa/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sngon byung raba'i gtam bstan pa 'di nyid rgyu cher tshig su bcad pa'i
294b5(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis rgyas par rab tu bstan to// ngas sngon spyad pa dag ni spyod pa na// de tshe rgyal po dpa' bas byin par gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes bya
294b6(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal gyi sar ni byung ba 'gyur// shing rta zhugs pas de tshe dge slong mthong // kun nas mdzes shing lta na sdug pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa// phyogs
294b7(mdo sde): rnams thams cad du yang snang bar byed// me tog zla mdzes phyogasu grags pa ste// snying rje gnas pa rab phan snying brtse ba// dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis mdzes pa ni// seM
294b8(mdo sde): rnams la brtse phyir grong du 'ongs// nga ni gzugs kyang de tsam mi phod pas// de la ngayang ra rdungs pa ma rungs skyes// 'dod la chags shing srid la bcings pas ni// 'di ni bdag gi
295a1(mdo sde): srid las spyod snyam ste// nga yi bu rnams stong du tshangs pa yang // shing rtar zhugs shing zham ring mthon dman 'gro/ cod pan dang ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan
295a2(mdo sde): sum cu dbang bying lnga yi bu 'brang bzhin de na nga yi bu mo lnga brgya dag/ nor bu thogs shing lham gyon blta na sdug/ mgo rgyan dang ni lhab lhub rgyan gyis spung // de dag gser gyi dra bas shing
295a3(mdo sde): 'dren/ nga yi bud med dag ni brgyad khri yang // gzugs mdzes shin tu bstan sdug pa dag/ shing rtar zhugs pas dge slong de mthong ste// ri rab bzhin du gzugs bzang
295a4(mdo sde): dpal 'bar ba// mthong nas de dag par yang 'du shes bskyed// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skyes te// / de tshe tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dag btsud// yid du
295a5(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i rgyan rnams de la gtor// de tshe nga ni phrag dog/ skyes par gyur// gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba mo bza de// dbang phyug rgyag pas bu la 'di skad byas// mdun
295a6(mdo sde): na 'dug pa'i dge slong gsad par gyis// gzhon nu de dag nga yis tshig thos nas// shin tu sdug bsngal yid kyang mi dgar gyur// ya ba cig de skad kyi ni tshig ma gasrung // dge slong
295a7(mdo sde): 'di 'dra bdag cag mi 'gum so// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du// bdag cag lus dang yan lag bcad btubs kyang // dge slong 'di ni 'gum par mi bgyid de// 'di ltar
295a8(mdo sde): bdag cag byang chub sems skyes// rgyal po de che bu yis tshig thos nas// khros te bsod pa'i gshed ma 'phangs la smras// nga yi btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi// dge slong 'di ni myur
295b1(mdo sde): du sod de phul// de nas bsod pa'i gshed ma phyi bzhin 'ongs// shin tu gtum sems dga' byed snying rje med// 'bru ma rang rabatags ral gri thogs na su// de yis dge slong
295b2(mdo sde): dum bu brgyad du byas// de yi lus dang yan lag bcad pa las// khrag kyang mi zag 'od gzer stong byung ste// bcad pa'i 'phro nas dpal be'u 'khor lo dag/ mtshan rnams de yi wa/ 
295b3(mdo sde): kyi nang du yod// shin tu ma rungs las ni byas na su// bskyed mos tshal du de yi mod la byung // dge slong me tog zla mdzes dran nas ni// de yi rtsed mo dga' bar ma gyur to// ri
295b4(mdo sde): pa'i gzugasu myur zhing 'gyogs par ni// de nas bad dag gi rgyal po'i pho brang song // gang du dge slong dum dbu brgyad byas pa// sa phyogs der ni shing rtar zhugs
295b5(mdo sde): nas byin// lce rnams khrag khrig mang po bar snang la/ cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra dag de thos te// rgyal phra khyod kyis mi dge sdig mang bgyis// shi 'phos nas ni
295b6(mdo sde): mnar med mi bder 'gro/ rgyal po des ni lha'i sgra thos nas// shin tu sdug bsngal mi dga' sems skrag gyur// bdag gis me tog zla mdzes bkrongs pa ni// bdag gis
295b7(mdo sde): sdig pa mi bzad mang po bgyis// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas ldan// sangs rgyas mi yi khyu mchog sras po gang // dbang po bsrung shing nges pa zhi ba'i yid// 
295b8(mdo sde): de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs// de bzhin gshes pa'i chos rnams gang 'dzin cing // zad pa'i dus la dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod// 'jig rten kun tu chos kyi sgron
296a1(mdo sde): ma mdzad// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs// 'jig rten kun na sman pa'i rgyal po gang // sems can na ba rtag tu gso byed cing // bdud rtsi dag glu/ 
296a2(mdo sde): bkru sman gtong ba yi// dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don phyir bkrongs// zhib cing zab la zhi ba lta dka' yi// chos rnams skye dgu dag la gang 'chad cing // byang chub snying po
296a3(mdo sde): mchog kyang gang ston pa// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis dkrongs// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin cing // 'jig rten mdongs pa'i sgron mar gyur pa ste// gzung
296a4(mdo sde): dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa// de ni ci slad bdag gis 'dod phyir dkrongs// nyon mongs med cing / rnam dag ye shes can// zhi ba rab ni rtag tu mnyam
296a5(mdo sde): bzhag pa// 'dod pas mdongs pa dag gis deng bkrongs te// des ni shin tu ma rungs dmyal bar ltung // sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang // mi yi dam pa rgyal ba
296a6(mdo sde): gang yang bzhugs pa ni bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams// de dag kun la thal mo sbyar te skyabasu mchi// // 'phags pa ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// // bam pa
296a7(mdo sde): bcu gsum pa// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes bsad de/ shi ba'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur par sa la 'gyel cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ sdug bsngal ni
296a8(mdo sde): yid mi bde ste/ 'gyod cing mos par gyur nas/ de'i tshe cho nges rab tu cher btab po// chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de la yang 'di lta bur yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bstod pa dang / snying rje dang
296b1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// kun tu bzang po 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis// khyod la rnam pa mang po bsgo ba bgyis// khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byung nga re// rin chen
296b2(mdo sde): ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud// khyod kyis dge slong dge 'dun tshig ma bzung // mgon po grong khyer du ni ci slang byon// khyod ni gang gi don du byon pa yi// don de sgron ma mdzad
296b3(mdo sde): gsol// lha rdzas mig gu sna tshogs brgyan pa yis// gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar shing ljon mang pos dkrigs// grub pa'i rog 'dzin gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs/ 
296b4(mdo sde): lha rnams bzhugs shing bya rgyal sgra yang sgrog/ kun tu ba bzang po sangs rgyas rtag zhugs pa// nags tshal dam pa dga' ba bor nas ni// bgyi ba gang phyir khyod ni
296b5(mdo sde): 'dir byon pa// nges pa bgyi ba de deng bdag la gasrungs// khyod kyi tshig thos nas ni bka' bzhin bgyi// sangs rgyas sras po bzhengs la bka' stsol cig/ kye ma da
296b6(mdo sde): ninaco bgyi lha yi lha// bdag ni mgon med khyod kyi skyabasu mchi// gcig pu seng ge ri dgas rgyal po ltar// dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khyu bor nas// sems can mtha' yas pa la thu/ 
296b7(mdo sde): brtse'i phyir// rang gi srog kyang btang ste 'dir byon na// 'dod chags zil non shin tu 'jungs pa yis// bdag gis dpa' bo dum bu dum bur bcad// 'dir ni dge slong dge 'dun mtha
296b8(mdo sde): dag kyang // khyod la lta bar pho brang ma lhags par// bdag ni 'jigs skrag khyod la ci gsol ba// de bar gsol ba gcig ni mdzad par 'os// me tog zla mdzes mi 'jigs bdag stsol la// 
297a1(mdo sde): nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengasu gsol// sems can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod// chos smra khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol// di ring bdag la sna cig sdang bar
297a2(mdo sde): mdzod/ nyi ma bzhin du snang mdzad bzhengasu gsol// chos sgra mchog ni bdag gis dkrongs bgyis te// sdig pa ma legs bdag gis der bgyis pas// 'di nas 'chi 'phos mi bzang
297a3(mdo sde): dmyal bar skye// bdag la de yi skyabasu 'gyur ba med// nyon mongs byed pa sdig sems ci ru rung // rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci ru rung // thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'a
297a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// 'di nas bdag gis snying po ci ma blangs// 'dod chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnam dag chos// sA ngan bar gsung ba bdag thul thugs rje can// 'gro ba'i gnyen
297a5(mdo sde): gcig sun 'byin mi mdzad pa// me tog zla mdzes bad ga gis ci phyir dkrongs// kye ma bzod dang bka' thub nor phyugs brtul zhugs bzang // kye ma gzugs
297a6(mdo sde): dang nges pa dag gi yon tan ldan// kye ma g.yo med dpal stug spros pa mi mnga' ba// bdag cag bor nas khyod ni gang du bzhad par mdzad// 'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag
297a7(mdo sde): bcad pa no// 'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung // 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad shin tu ngo mtshar gyur// ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhengasu gsol// kye ma me tog
297a8(mdo sde): zla ba dul ba thugs rje can// kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo tshur// kye ma chos rnams zab mo shin tu ston pa'i mchog/ lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs rjer mdzad
297b1(mdo sde): du gsol// kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshur spyon cig/ kye ma sa bcu legs gnas tshur spyon cig/ kye ma dpa' bo stobs bcus mngon 'phags pa// tshe la khyod dbang bdag po gang du
297b2(mdo sde): bzhud kye ma dpa' bo tshur spyon bdag la gsungs// khyod kyis yun ring bzod pa bsgoms pa dang // brtson 'grus thugs rje de dag gang du mchis// byams pa chen po bzhengs
297b3(mdo sde): las gsung phyung cig/ kye ma shin tu mchod 'os lha'i lha// chos smra cang mi gsung bar ci skad bzhugs// mkhas pa bzhengs la bdag gi khyim du bzhud// bud med tshogs la
297b4(mdo sde): khyod kyis chos ston cig/ lha khyod lus ni gcad par mi da nus te// lha dang lha min gnod sbyin srin pos kyang // / khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di mi shigs kyis// mkhas pa khyod deng
297b5(mdo sde): sgyu dag ma mdzad cig/ lha khyod sgyu mdzad bzhugs pa ga gda'// byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma mi mdzes// sgyu ma thams cad spangs la bzhengasu gsol// rin chen
297b6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i grong du chos shod cig/ kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdzes tshur// kye ma khams gsum 'dod chags bral ba tshur// kye ma pha ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur// bdag gi sems
297b7(mdo sde): dmyal sgo ni gcad du gsol// ngan song skyes pa rnams kyi rten dang dpung // srog chags mnar med chen por lhung ba yi// skyabs mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon cig/ bdag gi
297b8(mdo sde): bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol// mgon po khyod ni dgung bdun bshos ma gsol// re shig deng bzhengs bdag gi bshos gsol cig/ bdag gis bshos gsol rin chen
298a1(mdo sde): ldan pa 'dir// sems can du ma chos la dgod par mdzod// kye mchos mchog rtogs pa bdag gi yab// kye ma sems can rnams la khon med sem
298a2(mdo sde): kye ma tshur spyon bdag mdun chos ston cig/ kye mtshur spyon khyod smon myur grub shog/ dge slong dge 'dun de ni mgon med gyur// kye ma mdongs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid// sems
298a3(mdo sde): can snying po khyod ni myur bzhengs la// dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang 'byung ba mdzod// kye ma 'jig rten gsum na sgron gyur pa// kye ma tshur spyon kun tu bzang por bzhud// kun tu/ 
298a4(mdo sde): bzang po'i nags khrod bzhud nas ni// dge slong dedag la phan phyir khyod ston cig/ kye chos 'dzin ston/ rmad byung che// a shwad me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'// 
298a5(mdo sde): shes rab thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa// kye kye dge slong dge 'dun gzigasu gsol// tshig gi lam de nga bral ba'i gzungs de yang // kye kye dge slong dag la bstan
298a6(mdo sde): du gsol// kye kye zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir// me tog zla ba de ring bzhengasu gsol// kye kye rgyal sras bdag la thugs brtse ba// 'gro ba'i dbugs 'byin mdzad pa bla na med// kye kye
298a7(mdo sde): mtshon dang dbyug pas btab pa bzod// bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des// kye kye me tog zla mdzes thugs rtse can// rab sbyin 'dren pa khyod ni bzhengasu gsol// kye kye khyod ni
298a8(mdo sde): bzhengs la bdag la yang // mthong bar dka' ba'i gzungs rnams bshad du gsol// kye kye 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa// shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog/ kye kye son/ 
298b1(mdo sde): dag gi phan don la// brtson mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje'i stobs bcu ldan// kye kye me tog zla mdzes bzhengasu gsol// dpa' bo sems can dag gi don mdzad pa// kye kye sems can dag/ 
298b2(mdo sde): ni bye ba dang // khrag khrig rnams kyang ni ba'i grong du khyod// kye tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros che// mkhas pa bslab pa'i nor gyis shin tu phyug/ kye kye tshul khrims brtul zhugs rab gnas
298b3(mdo sde): shing / chos kyi shing gi myu gu mngon par dga'// kye kye chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur 'chang // rtag tu mngon par byung la dga' bar mdzod// kye me tog zla ba brtul zhugs bzang / 
298b4(mdo sde): rab sbyin dka' thub bzang po khyod bzhengs shig/ kye kye dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul// rtag par dngul ba'i gnas dang rje su ldan// kye kye dul ba rab dul
298b5(mdo sde): rje su bzhud// zhi ba rabya zhi khong nas des// kye kye sems can nyan zhing gnyid log pa// chos kyi sgra yi sa rtag tu sad par mdzod// kye kye sems can bye ba khrag khri/ 
298b6(mdo sde): dag/ sad par bgyis nas theg pa mchog la khod// kye kye sbyin pa yi ni spang leb la// brtson 'grus tha gas sbrel ba'i gru sbyor te// kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni// rab tu
298b7(mdo sde): ltung zhing sred pas ded pa rnams// kye kye stobs bcu ldan pa me tog mchog/ gnyen pa gdos 'dzin mkhas pa bezhengasu gsol// kye shin tu sra ba'i grwar yang ni// zhugs nas bdag
298b8(mdo sde): dang de dag bsgral bar mdzod// kye sman pa'i dam pa btul zhugs la// shin tu spyad cing rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog/ kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin// dam pa'i chos kyi rtse dag sbyin mdzad pa// kye
299a1(mdo sde): kye 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// btab pa'i sems can na pa rnams gzigs nas// kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la// chos kyi sman rnams shin tu sprul bar mdzod/ 
299a2(mdo sde): kye kye ye shes sman pa'i rgyal po mchog/ mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin// kye kye nad rnams shin tu gso mdzad cing // thugs rjes sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad/ 
299a3(mdo sde): kye kye na bar gyur pa'i sems can khams// 'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa'i rnams// des ni sems can thams cad bde ba dang // nad rnams med cing mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// kye kye
299a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa ye shes rgya chen bslabs// chos kyi rnga dag shin tu rdung bar mdzod// kye kye 'jig rten gyis ni the tsom gyi/ 'khri shing thams cad ye shes rgya mtshos tshad// kye kye legs
299a5(mdo sde): thos chos rnams 'dzin mdzad pa// rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya/ dag kyang // 'khor gyi nang du gdan la rab zhugs la// maM mchog mkhas pa brjod pa mdzad gsol// me tog zla ba
299a6(mdo sde): mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu tshangs pa kye// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lus brgyan kye// srid pa'i mtsho rgal spros med tshur spyon kye// srid pa'i btson rar tshung khrol
299a7(mdo sde): bzhengs shig kye// ye shes mchog rig tshangs pa 'dra ba kye// me tog zla ba thugs rje chen po kye// byams dang snying rje skyed la bzhengs shig kye// me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs// 
299a8(mdo sde): dge slong dge 'dun khyod kyis ma dor bar// tshur gshegs dge 'dun yongasu bsdu ba mdzod// bzhengs la nags khrod der yang gshegs sam kye// me tog zla ba bsam gtan dgyes pa mtsho// 
299b1(mdo sde): 'dza' dang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams shing phan// gzungs la rab tu gnas pa tshur spyon kye// ye shes sdong po mtshungs med khyod bzhengs shig/ ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa kye// sa
299b2(mdo sde): rgyas sangs rgyas sems can mnyam yid kye// me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs pa kye// bzhengs la shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod// lha yi rna ba chos kyi mchog 'chang kye// lha yi mig
299b3(mdo sde): mkhas ye shes rtogs pa kye// bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shig thugs rje can// grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi tshig gson kye// 'jig rten kun la phan dang don mdzad kye// me tog zla ba shin
299b4(mdo sde): tu sbyin dgyes kye// bzhengs la myur du bdag gi re rdzogs mdo dad // khyod 'dir dum bu dum bur ma bzhugs shig/ dgrong 'di skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams kyang // khyod mthong
299b5(mdo sde): thams cad shi bzhin sa la 'gyel// snying nems 'gyur bani/ mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid// thugs rje mchog gi spyan gyi de la gzigs// gang gi slad du byams pa bsgoms pa
299b6(mdo sde): dang / ye shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang // khyod kyi thugs rje btang snyoms dga' ba yangs// de dag rdzogs mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes// lha klu lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // 
299b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin srin po ma dang mi 'am ci// snum pa me tog bdug pas bkang nas ni// thams cad mthong bar dga' nas lhags shing 'khod// drang srong chen po'i tshig ni dang rtogs te/ 
299b8(mdo sde): skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin// yid kyi nang du 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i rgyu// de phyir 'dod pa'i spyo ba spang bar bya// dge slong bdag gis gsad pa'i sdig gi las// shin tu
300a1(mdo sde): dmyal ba mnar med 'gro/ bdag la de yi mgon skyabs byed pa med// bdag ni rgyal po'i srid btang tshang spyod gzhol// spros dang me tog byug pa rnams kyis ni// 
300a2(mdo sde): mchod pa dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya// shin tu mdzes par mchod rten bdag gis bya// bu dang bu mo bud med khyim bdag dang // blon po dang ni tshong dpon de dag dang // grong pa dang ni
300a3(mdo sde): rgyal rigs mang po rnams// de dag than cad la ni ngas bsgo ba// a ka ru dang tsan dan shug pa dang // shin tu zhim pa'i spos mchog ci yod pas// myur du sgrom gyi nang du khyogs chos
